However Fenghuang had mixed feelings about Po being the first to see them like this. One one hand she was glad it wasn't Shifu who answered the door, but on the other the panda was her former arch-enemy who would no doubt tease her the moment he figured out who she was.

"Aww well aren't you just the cutest little things in all of China" Po gushed upon looking down and seeing the diapered tigress cub and owlet, scooping up the two toddlers and giving them a warm bear hug.

"Wait a minute, what are you doing out here and where in the world are your mommies?" he questioned before setting them back down, "Can you tell me where they are?" Po asked while kneeling down to their level.

"Po..." Tigress began slowly before taking the plunge, "It's me Tigress."

The panda appeared confused for moment until realization dawned on his face. "Oh my god Tigress, you're...you're a baby!" Po exclaimed and the owlet rolled her eyes at the other's statement of the obvious.

"Why are you? How are you?" he stuttered uncomprehendingly.

His gaze then fell on Fenghuang as he began to study the owlet with a higher level of scrutiny, "Hey you sort of remind me of..." Po then gasped, "Fenghuang!"

The panda's expression turned angry as he adopted a fighting stance, "You're behind this aren't you. You had better turn Tigress back into an adult or else" he threatened.

Fenghuang was only slightly worried of the threat of physical violence when Tigress came to her defense with raised paws.

"Stop Po, she isn't to blame for this. In fact believe it or not she's one of the good guys now" she yelled.

Relaxing his pose Po asked, "Wait, really?"

"Yes, now if you could tell me where Viper is I'll explain everything" she promised.

"She's in the barracks having lunch with Crane right now" he answered.

"Take us to her now" Tigress demanded and the panda quickly complied, still in a bit of a daze from the bizarre situation he now found himself in.

Picking up the cub and owlet he carried the regressed pair across the courtyard and down the hillside. Entering the kitchen with the two in tow he found Viper and Crane pleasantly chatting while sharing a bowl of steamed dumplings.

"Hey there Po. Oh I didn't know you were babysitting today" Viper said with a smile, having been the first to notice her friend and what he had in his arms.

"Yeah, I'm kinda of not. Believe it or not this here is actually Tigress and Fenghuang" he admitted setting the toddlers down on op of the table.

Crane who had been in the process of swallowing a dumpling started to choke. Coming to the waterfowl's aid Viper slapped his back hard with her tail, causing him to get it down. Now able to breathe Crane immediately squawked, "WHAT!?"

"How did this happen?" Viper asked suddenly concerned for her now three year old feline comrade and friend.

At this point Tigress was then forced to explain herself to them.

But does she tell the truth or lie?
12531221121121.title: Meeting With Po, Crane and Viper

125312211211212.content:
Though Tigress cared about and loved her friends dearly she just couldn't bring herself to tell them about her adult baby fetish.

So instead she made up a story about how she spent the better part of the morning patrolling the forests surrounding the village. And that while she was doing so an extremely stealthy and well-trained bandit got the drop on her. Or would have if Fenghuang hadn't showed up out of the blue and came to her defense, striking the enemy before he could throw a knife at her. The two then tag teamed the bandit and after a few minutes of fighting managed to seriously injure their opponent. Before they could tie him up the bandit then hit them with a mist bomb that they quickly discovered was laced with youth potion that surprisingly made them both the age of three. While they were distracted and dismayed by their new shrunken state the bandit made a clean getaway. Afterwards Tigress said she questioned the owl as to why she helped her to which Fenghuang admitted that she had a change of heart which Tigress believed she was being truthful about. She then finished her tale by explaining that they then walked all the way back to the palace on foot. As for their clothes they left those behind in the forest.

Thankfully it appeared that her teammates bought her story as no one questioned it.

"Where'd you get the diapers?" Crane asked after a moment, eyeing the padded garments strapped to the toddler's waists.

"Uh, we stole them from a shop in town" Tigress replied, pretending to be ashamed, "We really didn't want to end up having an accident on the ground."

Though the three masters didn't condone stealing, they all silently agreed that it was necessary at the time and since it was a small theft decided to let it slide. Slithering over Viper caught both the cub and owlet off guard when she slipped the end of her tail down their diapers to check them, both lightly squirming at the invasion.

"Thankfully the two of you appear to still be dry and clean, well for now anyway. But I don't expect it to stay that way for too long given your young age" the snake surmised before turning to the waterfowl, "Crane could you be a dear and fly down to the village and buy some more? We're going to be needing them until the effects of the youth potion wear off. And be sure to take some yuan from the emergency fund to pay for them as this most definitely qualifies."

"On it" Crane said donning his straw hat before leaving the kitchen.

At that moment both Tigress's and Fenghuang's stomachs lowly growled. Hearing the sounds of hunger and noticing the way the babies were staring intently at the half eaten bowl of dumplings Viper came to their rescue.

"You two must be hungry. Let me take care of that" she warmly said grabbing a pair of chopsticks with which she then proceeded to feed them the rest of the dumplings, making sure they took small bites so as not to pull a Crane and choke. Both Tigress and Fenghuang shared similar happy looks at having their lunch fed to them by another person.

Feeling left out and wanting to help Po then asked, "Hey is there anything I can do?"

"Actually there is. Master Shifu kept some of Tai Lung's old baby furniture and toys and their in storage. I need you to go get it and bring it here" Viper ordered the panda who saluted before heading out the door. About fifteen minutes later he returned carrying the items she requested, Po setting them down on the floor.

Viper who was in the middle of feeding the last dumpling to Fenghuang smiled gratefully, "Thank you Po. If you don't mind set up the highchair here and the crib in my room. I don't know where to put the playpen just yet so just leave it there" she admitted and once again Po obeyed.

"Good girl" Viper cooed down at Fenghuang when she swallowed the last bite. the owlet blushing at the praise but loving it all the same.

With the food all gone and their bellies now full Tigress and Fenghuang simply sat on the table and waited with the snake. Crane returned not long after with a large supply of diapers and the necessary changing supplies to go with them. After setting the bag down Viper instructed the waterfowl to assist Po in putting together the furniture.

"Is this all really necessary? I mean they still have their adult minds" Crane complained as he helped Po begin assembling the crib, the highchair already finished and sitting in the corner.

"Yes" Viper hissed, "Adult mind or not, we're going to treat them the age they are."

Not wanting to angering the snake who appeared to be in full on maternal mode Crane shut his beak and resumed working. Once the crib was done and moved into Viper's room they reconvened in the kitchen, the three masters looking down at the two toddlers who continued to sit quietly.

"So whose going to babysit Tigress and Fenghuang until they return to their normal ages" Po voiced the obvious question.
125312211211212.title: Tigress's Tall Tale

1253122112112122.content:
"You two will look after them" Viper replied cheerfully.

Both Po and Crane shared equal looks of shock, with the two toddlers on the table surprised and a little intrigued by the idea.

She quickly explained her decision, "Sorry guys, I'd love to care for these little cuties but I promised to help Mrs. Yin down in the village today. But it's only for a few hours and then I'll come back to help you alright" Viper said, "Anyway I'm sure the two of you will make fine babysitters in my absence."

Po nodded in agreement, "Yeah I think me and Crane can handle it."

"It's simple. I already fed them so all you have to do is play with them and change their diapers if they need it" Viper instructed at which point Fenghuang raised a wing with a question.

"Yes Fenghuang?"

"What about Shifu finding out about me. I don't want to go back to jail as a baby" the owlet admitted fearfully.

Viper nuzzled the baby girl's head eliciting a coo, "Don't worry about him he went to run an errand for the day with Monkey and Mantis and won't be back until noon at the earliest. Then we'll explain the situation to him and make sure that doesn't happen." Reassured by the snake's words she felt herself relax.

Checking the time Viper realized she was going to be late, "Uh oh, I seriously got to have to go." She then paused long enough to give both Tigress and Fenghuang a snake hug goodbye, doing the latter's a few seconds longer since she adored the baby owlet. The others didn't know this but baby birds were kind of her weakness.

Once she left the kitchen leaving the two alone with the babies an awkward silence followed.

After a minute Po spoke up, "So I'm thinking we each take one."

Crane nodded thoughtfully, "Yeah that sounds fair."

"Great! I'll take Tigress and since well you're a bird and all you can have Fenghuang."

The waterfowl's feathers ruffled at the panda's statement, "Birds can take care of other species too you know" he retorted in slight anger, "But you're probably right that I should take her."

Turning to face Tigress and Fenghuang he asked, "You okay with this?"

The two girls nodded their heads. Tigress was disappointed that Po was going to be the one taking care of her instead of a certain green reptile, but reminded herself that it was only temporary until Viper returned.

Reaching down and picking their respective charges up from the table Po held the cub in his arms while Crane cradled the owlet in his wings.

"Now what?"

Po's question was answered when both of the girls began to use their diapers. Tigress only slightly quirmed around as she peed herself, the front of her padding turning yellow as she flooded it.

Meanwhile Fenghuang was experiencing the other kind of accident and was making a bigger fuss about it, kicking her legs wildly. Holding the owlet away from his body so as not to be scratched by her tiny talons as Fenghuang grunted. The back of her diaper suddenly sagged downward as she finished with a hoot of relief, smiling at the heavy fullness of her padding.

"Now I think we gotta change them" Crane replied.
1253122112112122.title: The Boys Babysit

12531221121121222.content:
The two agreed that the task of changing the two girls would best be done separately in the privacy of their own rooms. After dividing the supplies equally amongst themselves Po took Tigress to his room and Crane took Fenghuang to his.

Comically the waterfowl held the owlet at wing's length and turn his head slightly as a horrible odor began to waft up from her diaper. One that even with his terrible sinuses he could still smell, if only faintly. His slight expression of disgust was apparently funny to Fenghuang as she giggled.

"Glad you're enjoying this" he sarcastically remarked as he entered his personal quarters, quickly closing the door behind him.

Wasting no time he laid the stinky toddler down on his bed mat using it as a makeshift changing mat. Undoing the tapes on her diaper his beak scrunched up at the sight and smell of the baby's huge poop. Fenghuang giggled again, watching with amusement as he removed and threw away her soiled garment.

Being an exhibitionist she wasn't the least bit embarrassed by the fact that the other could now she her privates, her face not even turning red in the slightest when the waterfowl began to wipe her bottom. She cooed softly as powder was quickly applied to her diaper area and a new set of padding was secured around her person. With the change completed Crane picked her back up.

"Thank you dear, for dealing with that awful dirty diaper of mine" Fenghuang hooted gratefully while marveling at the feeling of her fresh padding.

"Well it's not like I could let you get a rash or anything" Crane lightly chuckled.

Snuggling up to and laying her head against the bird's chest she cooed, "You know I was really happy earlier when you agreed to care for me. I wanted to be around you instead of that fat panda because truth be told I've always found you kind of attractive."

"Really?" Crane blurted out in response to her declaration.

The owlet shyly nodded.

The waterfowl couldn't believe it. He had secretly harbored feelings for the villainous owl for the longest time, with Lord Shen having been the only other avian he ever developed a crush on. However he never admitted it to her because of two reasons. One, she was a bad guy and two, he was afraid of being rejected. But if what Tigress said about her changing her ways and her confession just now was the real deal.

"I feel the same way about you Fenghuang" Crane said his cheeks reddening.

"You do?" Fenghuang hooted in excitement at her luck, "You just made me the happiest owlet in all of China" she replied hugging the larger bird with her tiny wings. Crane eagerly hugged her back, overjoyed at having someone love him in the romantic way.

"You're not just the happiest but also the cutest one too" Crane said nuzzling the head of his new lover who happily smiled at the compliment. "That is until someone has to change you because that was quite the stink bomb you made" he teased and Fenghuang gave a small glower at his words but let them slide.

The waterfowl caught up in the excitement began to imagine him and Fenghuang getting married, starting a family and telling his kids how they met. Though he probably would leave out the part of how they got together mere moments after he changed their mother's diaper.

"So does this mean we're officially together, as in boyfriend and girlfriend?" he asked.

"Almost, there's something I want you to do for me first."

"Anything" the lovestruck bird replied.

Smiling Fenghuang then asked him to...
12531221121121222.title: A Couple Of Lovebirds

125312211211212221.content:
"Darling I would very much like it if you became a toddler like me" Fenghuang asked nicely.

"Wait, What? But why?" Crane exclaimed upon hearing the owlet's request.

Deciding to be honest with her love she told him, "Because I've always wondered what you looked like when you were a baby in diapers" she admitted before looking up at the waterfowl with large pleading eyes, "Please, do it for me?"

Despite her cuteness Crane was still on the fence about the whole thing, "I just don't know" he said rubbing the back of his long neck.

"Did I forget to mention that if you were a baby too you'd no longer be responsible for changing my diapers?" she smirked at seeing that little fact win the bird over.

"Okay I'll do it" Crane nodded his head, "But just how do you plan to regress me. I mean we can do it the same way the bandit did, with a youth potion. But those are expensive to buy."

"I've already thought of a way darling. We're going use one of the artifacts down in the palace vault to make you a baby" Fenghuang explained to the other.

"But those are dangerous which is why we keep then locked up. And besides what if Master Shifu finds out?"

"We'll be careful and Shifu isn't even here right now" Fenghuang pointed trying to keep the other on board.

"Alright" Crane said finally fully committed himself to breaking the rules and following through with Fenghuang's plan.

Opening the door and exiting the waterfowl quietly tip toed down the hallway carrying the owlet in his wings. Passing by Po's room he heard laughter come from within indicating that the two were having a good time. Fenghuang smiled at this, glad her little girl was still having fun despite her absence.

Crane left the barracks and made his way to the palace and the hall of warriors. Once inside he entered through the secret passage that led down into the underground vault. As he traversed the catacombs Crane made sure to disengage the booty trapped hallways before going down them. Eventually after half an hour of searching through the artifacts they found one capable of age alteration.

"The Urns of Prematurity and Maturity" Crane read the nearby scroll plaque, "Contains the mystical waters of youth and makes the drinker physically younger or old depending on which is drunk from. Caution, only way to reverse effects is with the other urn. Or in the case of the urn of Prematurity the passage of time. Huh, I guess that's the nice way of putting it that I'll have to grow back up all over again" the bird chuckled though the thought of having to go through puberty again terrified him.

Setting Fenghuang down on the floor the waterfowl faced the two urns. One was blue and the other red, the color being the only thing to differentiate them as they were exactly the same in size and shape. Both were water vases with a handle and spout for pouring.

Grabbing the one that was supposed to make him younger which was the blue one he turned to face his soon to be baby girlfriend. "Here goes nothing. Make sure to tell me when to stop because I do not want to end up as an egg" Crane told Fenghuang in a serious tone and recieved a reassuring, "I will."

Trusting the owlet Crane proceeded to drink from the urn and in the process grow younger before her eyes. The waterfowl didn't change much in appearance except for size as he regressed even when he became a teenager. However it was when Crane descended into childhood and his blue colored pants became much to big for the bird, falling to the floor around his ankles along with an adult sized diaper that had been underneath.

Stunned at seeing the crinkly garment Fenghuang momentarily stopped keeping track of the avian's regression, but resumed in time to tell him to stop when he had reached four years of age, preferring to be the younger one.

Setting the urn which he had been struggling to hold with two wings down on the floor Crane licked his beak at the long refreshing drink.

"Well, well...looks like I didn't need to regress you to see you in diapers after all" Fenghuang hooted with a smirk.

Wondering what she was going on about Crane looked at the owlet and followed her gaze downward and froze upon seeing the white padding lying at his feet. He the cursed himself for having forgotten that he still had his diaper on.

"Uh...I can explain" he said nervously with a gulp.
125312211211212221.title: Fenghuang's Regressive Request

1253122112112122212.content: Okay he's not a bedwetter, but maybe Crane secretly has a thing for them?
1253122112112122212.title: Another Reason For Being A Diaper Wearer

12531221121121222121.content:
"I'm listening" Fenghuang smiled, the owlet eager to know the reason her boyfriend of only half an hour had a diaper on.

Crane gulped nervously, "I like them, like alot okay? My mom coddled and babied the entire time I was growing up. She even made me continue to wear diapers up until I was ten years old when I was already fully potty trained at age four. Being in them for so long I developed a love for the garments and I went as far to use them in secret. But I would always change myself and get rid of my used diaper so my mom never found out what I was doing. If was also for that reason I only did it two or three times a month" he explained pausing to take a breath, allowing Fenghuang to ask a question.

"Why didn't you just tell your mother the truth? She sounds like she would have accepted your desire to stay in diapers, and would have even changed them too" the owlet questioned with a perplexed rotating tilt of her head.

Crane flared his tiny wings in anger, "Didn't you hear the part of how smothering I said she was. Not only that mom was overprotective too, in addition to my padding she made me wear a suit of armor until I was seven. If I told her the truth, and gods how I wanted to, then she would have just locked me up in a crib and bottle fed me for the rest of my life! Taking away my freedom in order to protect me from the dangerous outside world because she would only see me as her fragile baby boy" he finished in breathless exasperation.

Hearing this Fenghuang could understand the other avian's point of view. Her own parents had been the opposite, encouraging her training when they discovered she was a prodigy when it came to kung fu, practically handing her off to Oogway when he came to visit her. They wanted her to raise the status of their family and renounced her after she went rogue and tried to take the Jade Palace by force. Hearing about the waterfowl's overbearing mother made Fenghuang wish she could experience that kind of love and care.

Perhaps at some point she could convince her love to let her visit and babysit.

All these thoughts passed through the owlet's head in the few moments it took Crane to calm down from his little rant as he then continued, "Anyway long story short I let her take away my diapers, but I got them back six years later when I got my first job and could make my own money. Since then I've wore them in secret twenty-four seven without anyone finding out. The only person I told was a good friend who I knew in Lee Da academy named Mei Ling, and now you..." Crane concluded his story, feeling relieved at having gotten the whole thing off his chest and told someone his deepest darkest secret.

Until he remembered that person was his new girlfriend...or quite possibly soon to be ex-girlfriend.

"I know you must think I'm super weird for liking them, but please, please don't leave me because I really love you alot and..." Crane begged as his new younger emotions got the best of the waterfowl and he devolved into light choking sobs.

Fenghuang immediately rushed forward, the owlet wrapping her tiny wings around the other toddler, stroking the other's back gently. "It's okay Crane, I don't mind that you still wear and use diapers" she replied soothingly, "In fact I would love to change them for you...even if you had stinky pants."

Ceasing his crying the avian gave her a bewildered look, "Really...You would? But why?"

Fenghuang had a big smirk on her beak as she leaned in close, "It's simple my dear. It's because I like them to."

She then went on to explain to a stunned and shocked Crane that both she and Tigress were abdls. That they had been meeting in secret to play mommy/baby and how today they decided to become babies and be babysit by the masters, making up a fake story to hide the real reason for their regression.

"So you're saying that Tigress, "hardcore" Tigress is just as into diapers as I am?" Crane replied in disbelief.

"You better believe it and she's not shy about using them either. I actually changed a poopy diaper of hers not long before we came here" Fenghuang chuckled her words further blowing the bird's mind.

The waterfowl then shook his head, "And to think I was so afraid of the others finding out and kicking me out of the Five for being a freak, when this whole time there was another who felt the same." And to his great luck it was the very person he had expected to disappoint the most with his fetish.

"That's right my love, you're not alone" she smiled before asking another question, "So do you just like diapers or other baby things?" Fenghuang hinted.

The other toddler blushed as he responded, "Admittedly I've always been intrigued by...uh those things. Drinking from a baby bottle, sucking on a pacifier, being fed and sleeping in a crib" Crane gulped as he listed off each item. "But I've never been brave enough to buy those items, let alone use them. It took me three months to work up the courage and nerve to buy my diapers."

Fenghuang leaned over and gave Crane a kiss on his cheek that made the bird's whole face reddened, "Don't worry dear I'll make sure you get to have and experience all those things." The owlet then eyed her boyfriend and noticed his lack of clothing, "But first things first, we should get you a diaper before you have an accident all over the floor."

"Good idea."

While being nude didn't embarrass the waterfowl all that much, he neglected to mention that he felt even more naked and uncomfortable when he didn't have a diaper, Crane eager to get another set of crinkly padding put on him as soon as possible.

Gathering up his hat and oversized pants and hiding his adult diaper somewhere it would no be found the two made their way out of the vault and up to the Hall of Warriors. Upon arriving they were surprised to find Po running around playing a game of tag with a happy baby Tigress.

The two stopped when they noticed the little avians toddle out of the passage.

Seeing Crane's new age and knowing he now had three toddlers to take care of Po was...
12531221121121222121.title: How Crane Came To Be Diapered

125312211211212221212.content:
"Crane, is that you?" Po asked not quite believing his eyes.

"Y-Yeah..." the four year old nervously squeaked out in his new younger voice.

It was slightly intimidating when Po walked over as the panda was now so much bigger than him.

"Uh can you tell me why you're a baby now too?" Po then looked around suddenly as if expecting an attack, covering his head with his hands, "Oh no! Did that bandit sneak in here and strike again" he said afraid he was going to wind up back in diapers next.

"No it wasn't the bandit" Crane replied quickly, unwilling to continue that lie.

"Then why are you a toddler?"

The waterfowl was stuck for an explanation when his girlfriend came to his rescue, "I asked him to regress himself with one of the artifacts from the vault so me and my new boyfriend could play together as babies" Fenghuang told the truth with a smile. The owlet then gave Crane a big hug to show her love but also to use their collective cuteness to get out of trouble.

It worked to an extent as the panda merely frowned, "Look I get you were trying to be nice Crane and I'm happy the two of you are an item now, but you really should have said no. Now I've got to take care of you along with Tigress and Fenghuang, at least until Viper gets back" Po frowned at having another baby to be responsible for.

"I'm sorry" the bird whimpered out, feeling bad that he was making things difficult for the Dragon Warrior.

"It's fine, I can handle it" he said then asked, "Anyway you look to be about four years old. You don't need diapers now, do you?" Po asked hopefully.

"I kinda of do...sorry Po. At this age I still had accidents at night and during the day. Even though I was trying really hard to potty train I still had to wear them" Crane admitted telling the truth.

Po sighed as that had not been what he had wanted to hear. "Alright I'll put one on you but I want you to tell me when you need to go and I will take you to use the toilet. Okay?"

"Okay" Crane nodded when in reality he planned to do no such thing and was going to go potty in his diaper every chance he got. The waterfowl felt guilty for lying to his friend and fellow master but he wanted to live his padded fantasy so bad he was able to ignore it. Fenghuang who could sense what her love was thinking mischievously smiled at his intentions regarding the disposable garments.

Tigress who had silently stood by and watched didn't fully understand what was going on, but was happy at having another baby to play with and that her mommy apparently found love with one of her teammates.

Tigress and Fenghuang both followed when Po led Crane over to a nearby pillar where a bag sat. Taking the waterfowl's adult clothes from him the panda had the baby bird lie down on the floor while he removed the bottle of baby powder and a folded diaper.

While Crane was happy to be getting a new set of padding he was embarrassed by the fact that the girls were watching. He blushed as his legs were lifted and his exposed rear end was sprinkled with the white powder. His red face didn't return to it's normal color until he felt the thick diaper being done up around his waist, the tapes fastened and secured.

Po lifted him to his feet and Crane gave a small smile at being back in his disposable underwear.

"Thank you Po" he replied grateful for the other changing him into the crinkly attire. It had been the first time Crane had been diapered by someone other than his mother and he throughly enjoyed it. Crane could now hardly wait to go potty and get the full experience of a diaper change.

"You're welcome. Remember let me know the moment you feel the need to go" Po reminded and Crane nodded.

The trio of toddlers then...
125312211211212221212.title: A Third To Deal With

12531221122.content: Is that really the reason? Or does the owl feel lonely because she wishes she could take of more than just Tigress?
12531221122.title: Reasons For Loneliness

125312211222.content:
(Sorry, this should have been the second option for chap. 10)

"I wish I had another baby girl to take care" she cooed sadly admittedly having caught a touch of baby fever. Expecting Tigress to be unhappy at the notion at having to share her with another she was surprised when the cub beamed at the revelation.

"Cool. I always wanted a baby sister and plus I'll have someone my own age to play with, no offense mommy" Tigress replied.

"None taken" Fenghuang hooted, happy her baby girl was on board with the idea.

"Ooo can you go get her now?" she asked practically jumping up and down in joy at the thought of a younger sibling. She was so excited at the prospect that she accidentally wet her diaper, the front quickly turning yellow from her pee.

Noticing the discoloration of the cub's padding Fenghuang lightly churred placing her back on the table as she changed her again. Once she was back in a clean dry diaper she sat Tigress down on the edge of the table, the cub absentmindedly swing ing her legs back and forth while sucking her thumb.

"Alright before I go I need to know who I'm getting. And you my sweet little kitten get to choose who gets to gets to be babied with you" the owl explained with a smile.

"What are my choices?" Tigress asked after pulling out her thumb.

"Well since you're a feline I thought you might like another feline. But because there aren't many tigers that I'm aware of the closest thing I could think of was a leopard. Tai Lung is dead so that just leaves Song and the Wu Sisters. Pick whichever one you like."

Tigress concentrated hard on the two, suckling her thumb in deep thought. Song was very sweet and Po's friend from the Ladies of the Shade. While the Wu Sisters were a notorious trio of assassins that once terrorized China but were now locked up. They could be mean being bad guys but her mommy used to be bad so maybe they could change.

After careful thought she chose...
125312211222.title: The More The Merrier

1253122112222.content:
"I want the Wu Sisters" she decided.

One thing that influenced her pick was that Tigress secretly wanted to see what the legendary criminals looked like as cubs in diapers. Little did she know her mommy was thinking the exact same thing. Another reason to choose them was that there were three as opposed to one if she had gone with Song.

"Excellent" she hooted, "You stay here and I will be back shortly with your new baby sisters." Putting Tigress back on the floor she quickly grabbed three diapers and the half full baby bottle of youth potion milk before departing the house.

Flying as fast as she could the owl soon arrived at the secret prison where the sisters were kept. Silently sneaking inside and finding their cells which to her luck were right next to each other, the three clouded leopards seal in their own metal sarcophagus. Fenghuang shivered slightly as she recall the similar cage that Oogway built for her.

"Fenghuang, to what do we owe the pleasure?" Su, the leader asked narrow her eyes suspiciously at the rogue owl from the small opening.

"Listen up girls I'm here to make you an offer. I'm babysitting a three year old girl and I need others for her to play with. If you agree to regress to her age and do a good job as playmates for the day then I won't send you back to prison when you become adults again" Fenghuang explained the offer.

"You expect us to become toddlers...and play with a toddler?" Su questioned incredulously, her two sisters sharing her look of shock.

"I can assure you the child I'm looking after is still very much an adult up here" Fenghuang pointed to her head for emphasis, "However likes to act her age most of the time."

"Anyway make your choice and do it quickly before some guard notices I'm here" the owl warning the trio of the urgency.

Su the quickly conversed with her siblings, Fenghuang hearing every single word despite how quietly the leopards whispered to each other.

In the end the sisters decided to...
1253122112222.title: Freedom In The Form Of Toddlerhood

12531221122221.content:
"We talked it over and we decided to accept your offer" Su answered with only a hint of hesitation in her voice.

Fenghuang beamed as her number of little ones just went up by three, "Are you sure you've thought it through? You'll have to take naps, drink all you liquids from a baby bottle, and go to the bathroom in your diapers which I'll be in charge of changing" the owl cautioned Wan and Wing cringing a bit at the mention of the d-word.

"We are well aware of the...downsides...to this deal. But I'm willing to use my pants as a toilet for an entire day if it means finally getting out of here along with my sisters" Su replied as Wan and Wing nodded.

"Good, now drink this and don't stop until your three. There should be enough left in here if you share. Once you're all regressed then I'll let you out but not before" Fenghuang explained before starting with Su first. Since she couldn't move her arms in the tight space of the sarcophagus she had to feed the leopard the bottle through the eye hole. Once Su was small enough to move around Fenghuang passed her the bottle to hold and drink herself. After a minute of suckling noises emanating from the inside of the sarcophagus there came a tiny burp they sounded like it came from a very young child.

Reaching through the hole to retrieve the bottle which Su was kind enough to hold up for her Fenghuang repeated the process with Wan and Wing. Hearing two more satisfied burps she pocketed the empty baby bottle to be used for a later feeding. Making good on her promise she slashed the iron locks with her razor sharp wings, the sarcophagus's opening to reveal three cloud leopard cubs standing in a pile of adult clothes.

As they exited Fenghuang instructed each of them to lie down after which the owl proceeded to dress the toddlers in the diapers she had brought with her. While three year old assassins inspected the crinkly padding in disbelief Fenghuang fashion a carrying harness out of a nearby hanging tapestry. Scooping the baby cubs up she then exited the prison and flew off with her new girls.

"Oh and by the way there's one other rule I forgot to mention. From now on you all are to refer to me as momma or mommy, because that's what I am to you three now. Understood?"

"Yes mommy" the three chorused.

"Good girls" she praised.

On the way back Fenghuang stopped by a remote village that thankfully didn't recognize her and bought a large bag of diapers. She was going to need them seeing as she now four baby girls who weren't potty trained in the slightest. At the sisters request she also bought them clothes consisting of sleeveless vest and pants. They were just like their old ones but sized to fit a toddler. The reason behind wanted a wardrobe was that they all felt a little uncomfortable going around in just a diaper. A stark contrast to Tigress who love going around in nothing but her padding, displaying her pampers with pride.

Returning to the house after over an hour of being away Fenghuang found Tigress had spent the time taking a small nap on the couch. However her arrival had woken the kitten up and she had ran over to greet her new baby sisters, giving the three leopard cubs each a big hug as they were set down.

"Easy now Tigress, we don't want you accidently wetting yourself again" Fenghuang cautioned with a smirk.

Meanwhile the Wu Sisters were stunned that the great Master Tigress was the baby girl who they were supposed play with and entertain.

"Speaking of which I better check you your diaper to see if you need a change" she cooed going as far as to pull back the waistband and peek down the front and back, Tigress blushing as her garment was checked in front of the other girls.

Su, Wan and Wing collectively snickered at the sight. That is until the owl came up behind and did the same to each of them. Tigress smiled at seeing the crinkly padding hidden underneath when the sisters pants were pulled back, glad to have others around who were still in diapers. She grinned at still being able to see the white waistbands poking over the tops of their pants, visual proof of their padding.

After deeming them all clean Fenghuang allowed Tigress to show the new babies around while she sat back and watched.

It quickly became apparent that as three year olds the Wu Sisters are...
12531221122221.title: Baby Cub Assassins

choices: Put them down for a nap
125312211222212.content:
Roughly half an hour things got a bit chaotic for the owl.

"Momma Wing won't let me play with the toy train" Wan complained as Wing replied, "I told you I'll let you have a turn when I'm done and I'm not done yet."

"You been hogging it for the last half hour. I want to play with it now!" Wan demanded stomping over and trying to wrestle away the prized toy from her sibling. Wing responded by stubbornly holding on tightly, "No, it's mine."

"Girls, what did I say about fighting?" Fenghuang warned too preoccupied with her current task to break up the squabbling.

"Mommy Tigress keeps staring at me while I'm being changed" Su whined covering her exposed crotch with her paws. The cub was currently lying on the table with a her diaper opened up and displaying her mess. Su wished she could cover her eyes as she was so embarrassed at not only being the first to use her diaper but to poop in it as well.

As for the previously mentioned feline was standing on a nearby chair, resting her head and paws on the edge of the table. Her tail swished behind her as she stared unblinkingly at Su.

"Tigress honey, could you maybe turn away or cover your eyes while I finish changing Su here" Fenghuang asked her little girl gently.

"But mommy I really want to watch" she said with a small whine.

It's true she did, as up until now Tigress never got to see or watch another baby be changed and seeing the whole process from the viewpoint of an onlooker fascinated her to no end. Not to mention it was the notorious Su Wu who was getting her diaper changed, and a very dirty one judging by the large brown mound in the seat. Even the pungent aroma wafting from the other girl's padding wasn't enough to deter the curious cub.

"But nothing young lady. Unlike you Su is uncomfortable with having an audience so respect her wish to have some privacy."

"But she's a baby now. She doesn't have any privacy anymore" Tigress retorted.

"Tigress..." Fenghuang began in a tone that she knew she'd be punished for talking back to.

"Fine" Tigress grumbled before covering her eyes, though widening her fingers just a smig to peek through.

She then saw her mommy pull Su's stinky old diaper out from under her, wrap it up and throw it away. Su watched the action with a strange look as it felt odd to see her poo get tossed in the trash as opposed to being flushed down the toilet. Her legs were then lifted up exposing her cute furry behind, which lovingly and tenderly cleaned by the owl. Again her expression changed at the weirdness of having someone else wipe her butt. After a healthy sprinkling of powder to get rid of any lingering odors Su found herself being taped back up in a clean diaper.

As Fenghuang finished putting her pants back on a loud cry from Wan drew the three's attention to the poor cub who was lying on the floor, Wing standing nearby holding the toy train looking extremely guilty.

"What happened!" Fenghuang demanded angry at seeing one of her precious cubs hurt.

"She shoved me" Wan tearfully before beginning to lightly sob.

"It was an accident. I didn't mean to" Wing replied quickly, fearful of her mommy's wrath.

Setting Su back on the floor Fenghuang rushed to Wan's aid, scooping her up in her wings. Taking a seat in a chair she gently patted the crying girl's back, desperately trying to calm her down. Meanwhile Su and Tigress toddled over to their mommy's feet, patting Wan's legs comfortingly while deeply frowning at Wing.

Feeling horrible Wing slowly came over and tried to give the train to her sister as if that would make things better between them. However Wan refused to acknowledge the gesture as she continued to cry into the owl's chest feathers.

"I'm only going to say this one more time...No more fighting. All of you maybe babies in body but you have still have the minds of adults. Next time something like this happens I'm going to spank the one responsible." At this Fenghuang turned to look at Wing, "Now Wing apologize to Wan."

"Sorry Wan" she said.

Once Wan had calmed down enough to stop crying she thought now would be a good time to...

151.content:
Crane woke up early one morning, the waterfowl stretching his wings as he roused himself from slumber. Checking the time he saw that it would be an hour until the morning gong went off. Crane was grateful for that as he would need that extra time for a certain secret activity of his. The avian quickly made sure his friends were still fast asleep, hearing the sounds of light snoring before carefully undoing the purple sash that held up his blue colored pants. Allowing them to drop unceremoniously to the floor revealed a shocking sight as the underwear the waterfowl wore underneath turned out to be a thick white disposable diaper that was snugly strapped around his waist.

Now believe it or not but the reason the illustrious master of crane style was padded up was because...
151.title: Crane

1511.content:
Unbeknownst to the rest of the Furious Five Crane had a strong desire to wear diapers again. He wasn't exactly sure what started his obsession with the padding. Maybe it was due to the fact his mother coddled him so much when he was younger that was the reason he wore them. Even he was potty trained at roughly age four his mom insisted he continue to wear diapers until he was seven, which had nearly been embarrassing as that suit of armor. That could have factored into helping develop his crinkly fetish.

Or maybe he just wanted to feel young, the waterfowl wearing the padding in order to reclaim his youth despite being an adult. Crane's desire to be diapered had brought out a yearning within him to be a baby again. When he was alone and had put one on Crane would often act like a young child by sucking his thumb or speak with a childish lisp imagining himself as a toddler, a very big toddler. And another thing that should probably be mentioned is that Crane didn't just wear diapers, he used them too! He even loved being changed, the act of getting cleaned up and put in a new one even by himself was pleasurable and invigorating, such was his love for the garment. If it wasn't for the norms of society and the fear of his friends finding out the avian would openly wear them. He would also stop using the toilet altogether and become dependent on the babyish garments by becoming incontinent.

All these thoughts ran through his mind as Crane stood there in the middle of his, clad in nothing but his crinkly attire. Smiling to himself he reached down with his right wing and rubbed the front of his diaper while sticking his thumb in his beak and rhythmically sucking on the feather. His eyes became half lidded as the action immediately comforted him. That is until an important urge hit the waterfowl a minute later as he felt the need to go to the bathroom as he did most every morning. The thought of leaving to use it the toilet completely skipped the bird's mind, and why shouldn't it when he was wearing his around his waist. Grinning to himself at this internal logic and having already made the decision to go to the bathroom in his pants he calmly relaxed his body and let go.

A few seconds passed before Crane started...
1511.title: Crane's A Bit Of A Big Baby

15113.content:
Crane sighed in relief as he felt a trickle escape into the front of his padding, a small yellow spot appearing on the former field of white. He moaned lightly as that trickle quickly grew into a mighty stream, the stain on the outside growing larger as his diaper dutifully absorbed his urine.

But the real test of his garment came when the waterfowl sensed a pressure in his rear and realized his bowels were full and also needed release. Still in the middle of peeing himself Crane stuck his butt out a little before adopting a look of intense concentration, his beak clenched in preparation of his next action. Despite his years of conditioning to use the toilet the need to pop was so great that it only took a small push on the avian's part to get him to start messing. Crane gasped as seconds later he felt the head of a massive turd emerge from his tail hole, the seriousness on his face melting into a goofy grin as he start to relax. He then let out a series of small happy grunts as he pushed the large poo into his awaiting padding, loving the way it stretched to accomdate his efforts. His smile grew bigger as a huge and noticeable bulge appeared in the seat of his diaper, a telltale sign that he had gone number two in his pants. Just thinking the thought made the bird giddy with pleasure.

As Crane finished pooping he noticed he had also finished emptying his bladder, his diaper a bright yellow and sagging in the front. The waterfowl then spent the next couple of minutes enjoying his well used padding until the distinctive smell of feces reached him. Letting out a moan at the pungent reminder that he was stinky and needed a diaper change Crane went over to a nearby shelf and lit two incense candles to mask there smell of his dirty dead. For good measure he also cracked the window open a little.

Satisfied with the countermeasures Crane returned to his bed Matt and laid down, being extremely mindful of his bulging rear end. Sticking his thumb in his beak and sucking on it fervently with half lidded eyes. As he suckled his feather he lifted his long skinny legs into the air and waved them idly around, giving light kicks as he continued to lie on his back. With his free wing he reached down and lightly rubbed his wet padded crotch while breathing in the intoxicating scent of his very full diaper, finding the smell to be homely rather than disgusting.

The master of crane style remained in this bubble of infantile bliss for what felt like forever when he...

151131.content:
Crane felt so at peace that the avian's eyes slowly went lower and lower until they closed completely. The bird lightly snored as he continued to suck his thumb as he slumbered a pleasant dream coming to his mind.

He suddenly found himself back in his childhood home and he was a lot smaller and younger than before. Looking down at himself Crane broke out into a big grin as he saw he was a toddler again, approximately four years of age. Feeling a thickness underneath his pants he pulled back the waistband of his pants he saw to his joy that he was dressed in a diaper. But not just any diaper...a baby-sized diaper that fit him perfectly because he was a baby now.

Letting his pants snap back into place Crane giggled to himself before taking off and running throughout the house with childish excitement. When he reached the kitchen he suddenly stopped as he ran into his mom who was busy washing dishes and humming softly to herself. The larger female waterfowl stopped what she was doing when she heard him enter and turned to face her son with a warm smile. "Ah there's my little man. Having fun playing?" she asked him to which Crane responded with a shy nod. His mom melted at his small gesture, "Aww come here Crane and give mommy a hug" she said opening her wings wide. Without hesitation the toddler hatchling rushed toward and into his mother's awaiting wings, her picking him up and giving him a big squeeze. Crane smiled as he nuzzled her soft breast happy to be in his mother's loving embrace. "Hmm since I got you I wonder if you need a change. Let me check your diaper Crane" she cooed softly. The young waterfowl blushed and giggled at the intruding wing that invaded his pants, quickly feeling the front and back of his garment. Inwardly loving the surprise check Crane relaxed and let her do her thing. "Nope. Seems momma's little boy is still clean" she chuckled as she continued to hug him while rocking him side to side, the gentle motions soothing him.

However the next thing he knew...
151131.title: A Dream of Youth

1511311.content:
Crane was startled out of his pleasant baby dream by a loud echoing ringing sound, plucking his sodden feather from his beak. Realizing the morning gong just went off and Master Shifu would be here in less than five minutes while he was still wearing a wet and messy diaper sent the waterfowl into a panic. Opening his secret storage compartment in the floorboards he quickly pulled out the changing supplies and immediately set to work untaping and removing his soiled padding. As he was feverishly wiping his crotch and bottom clean with baby wipes he tried his best to enjoyed the change somewhat despite the urgency to complete the task at hand. Once his lower regions were clean he dropped the used wipes into the old open garment lying beside him.

Balling up the dirty diaper Crane dumped it in his sealable metal diaper pail, intending to dispose of it later in the dead of night. Even though he had less than two minutes before his master showed up and he was more or less done he made the snap decision to put another one on, the waterfowl really wanting to go padded for the day. Snatching a fresh pair of padding from the bag Crane unfolded it and slipped it under his rear, sighing a little as his feathery butt made contact with the cushiony softness. With the baby powder bottle in his wing he applied a light coating to his crotch and the inside seat of the pamper. He had to make sure to use the barest amount lest he risk the chance of the others smelling it. Although if they ever did the bird had a plan to simply play it off as him having a rash, however embarrassing that lie may be. Grasping the waistband with both wings Crane pulled the front up tightly between his legs, loving the thick snugness that now spread them as he held it against his stomach.

He had just finished doing up the tapes on either side and was pulling up his pants when he noticed the rising dark silhouettes on the other sides of the paper walls. Realizing that his friends were waking up and he only had a few seconds left Crane quickly redid his purple sash, replaced the loose wooden floorboard, and after getting to his feet flapped his wings to create a small gale that blew out the incense candles and sent any lingering odor remaining in the room out the open window. Placing his rice hat on top his head Crane confidently strode out of his room at the same time Po, Tigress, Viper, Monkey and Mantis left theirs.

“Greetings master” they all chorused as they bowed to the red panda standing in the hallway.

“Greetings my students” Shifu replied with a brief smile, “As usual everyone headed to the kitchen then after you’ve finished breakfast meet me in the Hall of Warriors for today’s agenda.”

And with that the small master left the hallway as the six of them made their way to the kitchen eager to get something to eat. Breakfast turned out to be a hardy bowl of wheat porridge, prepared courtesy of Po along with a jug of milk to wash it down. As they ate and chatted amongst themselves Crane remained silent as he ate his food. After every two or three spoonfuls of porridge he’d take a drink of milk from his cup allowing the white liquid to run down his long beak and down his throat. However each time he drank from his cup the waterfowl pictured himself drinking from a more babyish container, imagining the milk in a baby bottle with him suckling the rubber nipple. His daydream was so great that for a few seconds he actually suckled his milk instead of sipping it down, drawing weird stares from the other master. Blushing Crane corrected his mistake and resumed drinking the normal way, his friends instantly forgetting the weird behavior. All six ended up finishing eating not longer after with Po being the biggest eater, having had five bowls of porridge. But what was surprising was that today he was the second biggest having eaten three whole bowls, the waterfowl lightly rubbing his very fully belly as they all made their way to the palace hall.

Upon entering the large and spacious grand hall they met with their master who announced that today’s focus would be…
1511311.title: Saved by the Gong

choices: Stone of Desire - grants unlimited wishes
Urn of Prematurity - makes people physically younger
15113112.content:
When the Dragon Warrior and Furious Five entered they noticed Shifu standing beside the sacred moon pool along with Zeng. The messenger goose was standing nearby as the red panda read through a scroll that had most likely just been handed to him by the other. Thirty seconds passed before the master pocketed the scroll in his robe and dismissed Zeng who bowed before leaving the hall.

Turning his head Shifu noticed the arrival of his students and a look of relief crossed his face.

“Ah good you’re all here, I was just about to come get you” Shifu said.

Tigress was the first to notice the look of distress on her master’s face, “Master…what’s wrong?” she asked right away.

Breathing a heavy sigh he answered, “Unfortunately I just got word that the resting place of a dangerous and powerful artifact was just discovered by some wandering travelers not too far from the valley.”

“So, that doesn’t sound too bad. We can just head on over there and grab it, no biggie” Po replied not seeing what the big deal was.

“It is bad Dragon Warrior, because I also got word that Junjie received news of the location and he’s on his way there with his students to collect it as we speak” Shifu stated grimly, “And under no circumstance can we let that mad fox get his paws on it.”

The group shared looks of concern as Tigress spoke up.

“Master, do you know what the artifact is?” she questioned a bit hesitantly.

“As a matter of fact I do, this artifact just so happens to be one of the few relics that Master Oogway and I weren’t able to find and securely lock away in the palace’s vault…before his tragic passing that is” Shifu replied.

“Uh I think Tigress was asking more along the lines of what the thing’s name is” Mantis proposed.

Shifu gave the bug an annoyed and stern glare, “I was just about to get to that Master Mantis.”

“Oh, sorry my bad” the insect apologized before zipping his lips and allowing the other to continue speaking.

“Ahem as I was saying its one of the rare few we never tracked down and it’s the…”
15113112.title: An Artifact Retrieval Mission

151131121.content:
“…Stone of Desire, an ancient relic with powers beyond comprehension. Of all the artifacts that had to surface right now it just had to be the worst one on the list” Shifu grumbled to himself as he felt a slight headache coming on.

“That bad huh?” Po questioned with a frown.

Shifu lifted his head to the panda, “You have no idea Dragon Warrior. Remember the Warhammer of Lei Lang? Compared to the Stone of Desire its nothing but a stick with a piece of metal attached to the end” he said hoping the comparison would showcase the gravity of the situation to Po, and it did.

Memories of the brief destruction the Warhammer caused flashed through Po’s mind and for him to learn there’s something worst made him paled slightly.

“So its like end of the world serious” he replied.

“Only if Junjie gets his paws on it” Shifu said with a nod.

“Then we can’t let that happen” Tigress responded with a defiant growl.

Monkey also getting pumped and pounding a fist into his open palm, “Yes, we should all go and kick his butt.”

“Sweet, let’s do this…” Po said as he started running for the front door, “Whoo, it’s time to bring the thundah on some bad guys!” he cried out.

“PO…WAIT!”

The panda hearing the order immediately skidded to a stop.

“Before we leave I have to explain how the Stone of Desire works” Shifu said giving the Dragon Warrior an annoyed look at his impatience.

“Oh right…yeah, that’s probably a good idea” Po sheepishly replied as he walked back to the group, with most of the members of the Five giving the panda a few snickers at his exuberance; mainly Monkey and Mantis. Only once he returned did the red panda began a lengthy explanation, “The Stone of Desire is a stone capable of granting one’s deepest desires in the form of wishes. All one needs to do to use it is touch it with their hand and announce their wish aloud while keeping contact with the rock. There is no limit to the number of wishes the stone can grant or the type of wish it can grant, and that’s what makes it so dangerous. It can easily influence time and space, reality itself bends to its will and the will of whoever uses it. Legend has it that the stone is a physical piece of the center of the universe and the reason it has such power over it.”

Shifu paused for a few moments to let what he said sink in before continuing,

“Another thing that’s troubling about the stone is that any wish made on it changes reality so that everyone other than the wielder is unaware that anything’s different. Example if I wished for say that the sky was green instead of blue the stone would make it so and everyone in the world besides me would think that the sky was always green, with no memory that it was ever blue in the first place. The more complex the wish, the more complex the changes to people’s collective memory and history itself. However I suppose no matter how bad the wishing gets one could simply wish everything back to normal” Shifu bemused while stroking his beard.

Viper who had chosen to speak up at this point asked, “W-What do you suppose Junjie will wish for if he gets the stone.”

The red panda pondered the snake’s question, “I don’t know. Junjie’s always wanted to be master of the Jade Palace but I highly doubt he’ll settle for that now considering the power of the stone, or if he does it won’t satisfied him for long. It could be any number of things, he could wish to be the Dragon Warrior instead of Po, wish for all of you and me to be his students or his loyal servants…or simply wish us out of existence, or he could just cut to the chase and wish himself Emperor of China, heck why stop there…he’d probably make himself ruler of the world” Shifu continued to muse darkly.

Po who had been listening intently the entire conversation was inwardly panicking at what he heard, suddenly becoming very fearful for his and his friend’s lives. The rest of the Five were similarly concerned for the future after hearing their master’s explanation.

“Now that you know about the stone and what’s at stake its time to go. Time is of the essence” Shifu announced as he began moving for the door.

Seeing this everyone followed after the red panda with the exception of Crane who took flight as they left the palace together.

---

An hour and a half later had the kung fu masters at the bottom of an underground chamber of a buried temple, fighting against Junjie and his snow leopard students for the Stone of Desire. The aforementioned artifact was currently resting in the upraised stone hand of an enormous statue in the center of the chamber. At the moment each of the five were climbing up the side of the statue while also battling against a leopard each. When they first arrived Shifu had ordered Crane to fly up and retrieve the stone only for the avian to be blindsided by one of the feline warriors. Right now the waterfowl was struggling to get the leopard who was holding onto his long thin legs off him, while also trying to remain airborne and fly properly. Meanwhile Shifu and Po were tag teaming Junjie on the statue’s other arm which was outstretched, acting as a bridge of sorts.

As Crane avoided another swipe of the leopard’s claws, he saw something that made his heart nearly stop, Po almost falling off the statue due to a cheap shot from the fox master. While the panda hung on for dear life Junjie took advantage of Shifu’s shock to get around the red panda and make a mad dash for the stone.

“CRANE! GET THE STONE BEFORE HE DOES!” Shifu cried out in desperation.

Horrified by the turn of events Crane looked down at his unwanted passenger with an angry look. He then angled his wings to slam the two of them into the nearby wall, the blow ended up hurting a lot but it succeeded in knocking the feline loose and leaving him flattened on the surface. Shaking off the pain he flapped his wings and began speeding toward the top of the statue, flying faster than he ever flew before. Just as Junjie was about to reach up and grab the stone Crane swooped in and snatched the rock up with his talon. “Denied” he cheekily replied as he flew off with his prize.

“Alright, Crane for the win” Po shouted with grin, throwing up on of his arms in victory. However the panda forgot he was hanging from something so for a split second he was hanging on by one arm before grabbing back on with his other. Seconds later Shifu came to help pulled the Dragon Warrior up and to safety.

After that things happened fast as taking the stone from its resting place caused the whole place to start falling apart and cave in. Somehow in all the confusion the seven masters managed to escape the temple before it fully collapsed and make it back to the outside. Everyone was apparently uninjured despite the fight they all just had and while Shifu was confirming this Crane walked over to him with the Stone of Desire clutched in his wing.

“Here Master Shifu. I think you should have this” he said presenting the rock to the other.

Shifu stared at the mystic rock for a moment before shaking his head with a small smile, “Go ahead and hang onto it until we get back to the palace. I trust you not to use it and also you deserve the honor considering you’re the reason Junjie doesn’t have it. Just keep it hidden and everything should be fine” Shifu admitted.

The waterfowl simply nodded and pocketed the stone in his pants as his friends crowed around him and congratulated him on saving the day, and in Po’s case heartily slapping him on the back.

“Alright everyone, I think its time we headed back to the valley” Shifu said and Po, Tigress, Monkey, Viper and Mantis agreeing began following the red panda back to the road.
