His friends all had the same dumbfounded looks on their faces as they gazed down at him.

“H-Heya buddy. The gong rang and you kinda slept through it so we all decided to come wake you up heh” Po said with a slightly nervous.

Crane felt his face pale as he heard that he fell back asleep and how that one slip up led to his current predicament.

To make matters worse the smell from his diaper reached Po at that exact moment, the panda’s nose scrunching up at the offending odor.

“Oof, I think you might be needing a change Crane” he said referring to his soiled diaper which pinching his nose.

Looking behind the Dragon Warrior he saw Shifu, Tigress and Monkey doing something similar with their hands. Viper and Mantis lacking limbs and opposable thumbs were forced to rely on their tail and pincers to hold against their nose to block the smell of Crane’s messy padding. Speaking of which the used garment which had previously brought the waterfowl such joy now felt like a burning shame taped to his rear. Or at least the bird hoped so, the last thing he needed right now was to get diaper rash.

Meanwhile everyone in the room continued to remain silent, no one sure of what to say next. In that awkward space of no words Crane realized he had his thumb in his mouth and slowly removed the moist feather bit by bit before calmly and carefully resting the wing it was attached to by his side.

Eventually someone did break the silence and say something, and unfortunately that someone turned out to be Mantis.

“Dude, why in the world are you wearing a diaper?” he asked the frozen bird.
1511312.title: The Baby Bird Is Busted

1512.content:
Crane looked down at the front of his padding which was tinged a bright yellow color the diaper sagging slightly between his long legs, evidence that the avian had peed in it during the course of the night.

The now aptly named waterfowl simply let out a small sigh at the discovery, a sight he had grown used to seeing each and every morning. Even after years of it happening the bird still held out some small hope that one he'd eventually wake up with a dry diaper. But alas that wish had yet to come true for him.

The truth of the matter was that he, the great Master Crane, was a bed wetter and had been for the better part of his life. Ever since he was nine years old he had to wear diapers to bed or else he'd wind up with soaked sheets. His mother took him to see a trusted family doctor who couldn't find anything psychologically or physically wrong with him to explain the constant bedwetting. His naturally overbearing mother actually liked the news as it meant her little baby boy wasn't completely grown up while he on the other hand was crestfallen.

Over the years Crane had made peace with the fact the he wasn't completely out of diapers, at least during the night that is, instead being grateful he didn't have to wear during the day where other people could find out his hidden shame. After leaving home to attend Lee Da academy he had to become more cautious about his padding. And despite not wanting to telling nobody he confided in his first great friend Mei Ling about his nighttime problem and she didn't think less of him for it. In fact she frequently helped him clean himself up on some occasions, much to the waterfowl's charging. His diapers became even more difficult to hide when he came to the Nade Palace and joined the illustrious Furious Five and yet somehow he managed to keep it under wraps. The hard part was whenever they were forced to go on long missions in where he carried along a backpack that was full of spare diapers. He made sure to never let any of his friends look inside it and made doubly sure to wake early every morning in order to go off to change out of and dispose of his soggy padding. Due to this constant routine Crane became an early bird, the avian always getting up before any of the others.

And for the past decade no one at the palace was any wiser. He never told anyone about his wetting the bed, not even Master Oogway thought he secretly suspected the old turtle knew somehow. Crane was just too afraid of being rejected to tell his master and his friends about his greatest secret, with him feeling slightly guilty for not trusting them as a result.

Remembering the damp diaper currently on his person Crane broke out of his own thought in order to change himself. As he awkwardly waddled across the room his padding made some light squishing sounds and Crane blushed at the noises as he enjoyed them. Recently the waterfowl had started to really like the feeling of his used morning diapers, even staying in them a bit longer than usual before changing out of them.

Ignoring the weird thoughts in his head he lifted the loose floorboard and retrieved his hidden stash of supplies before returning to and lying down on his bed mat, getting comfortable for his change.

Crane had just undid both the tapes and opened up his diaper and reached out a wing to grab a handful of wipes with which to clean his crotch when someone opened the door to his room without knocking.

That person turned out to be...
1512.title: A Real Waterfowl

choices: He's just that good a friend
Turns out Po wears diapers too
15121.content:
“Hey Crane I was going to make breakfast early and w-“

The rest of the sentence died on his tongue when he saw the scene before him, namely Master Crane lying on the floor completely naked with a very wet diaper lying open underneath his butt. Po may not be the smartest kung fu master but even he could tell that Crane was in the middle of changing himself.

“P-Po, don’t…this isn’t what it looks like I swear” Crane nervously stuttered, overcome with fear at being discovered. The waterfowl then covered his crotch with both wings in a half hearted attempt to save what was left of his dignity.

Po on the other hand merely stepped into the room and closed the door behind him.

“No don’t come in. Po please, please just go away and forget you ever saw this” Crane practically begged the Dragon Warrior.

However the panda didn’t listen and instead silently walked over to kneel down beside the distraught bird.

Reaching down he placed a finger to the avian’s beak, “Shhh it’s alright Crane. I’m not going to judge or make fun of you. I’m just surprised you still wear diapers that’s all.”

“I don’t…” Crane weakly whimpered, “I…I have…a bedwetting problem” managed to choke out.

The panda frowned a little at that.

“Oh…I never knew.”

“Well its not something I go around advertising” the waterfowl weakly chuckled, trying to lighten the mood with a bit of humor.

Po gave the other smile before looking down at the bird’s lower regions and remembering his friend’s predicament, “Looks like you were about to clean yourself up when I interrupted you. Do you want me to do it for you?”

Crane’s face blushed bright red at the question, “Po…that’s a really personal thing you’re asking” he replied with an obvious frown, uncomfortable with idea of a friend touch him down there.

“I know and I shouldn’t have asked, but I was just trying to be helpful. You know can trust me right?” Po asked with pleading eyes.

He stared into the Dragon Warrior’s luminous green eyes and found his resolve to say no weakened considerably.

“I know I can Po. Alright I’ll let you clean me up, just be respectful and don’t try anything” Crane consented.

“Gotcha…now just relax and let me take care of you.”

The avian gave a small nod as he watched Po grab both his legs and hoist him up, sliding the wet diaper out from underneath him. He then grabbed the wipes he had dropped in shock when Po opened the door and proceed to clean his privates. Crane felt his face turn as red as a tomato as his member and balls were generously wiped down. Despite it being an invasion of his privacy Crane feelings of embarrassment surprisingly turned to pleasure as he grew to like the foreign sensation of another person cleaning him up. Those feelings spiked for the few seconds that Po decided to also do his butt even though he had only wet himself. By the time his bottom was squeaky clean the bird had a bashful grin on his face.

Seeing the panda reaching for the baby powder bottle Crane was quick to speak up.

“Don’t use too much. I don’t want the smell to be too noticeable” he said.

“Sure thing” Po replied before sprinkling a small amount of powder onto the bird’s crotch.

After that it was a simple matter of the panda wrapping up his old soggy diaper, using the sticky tabs to rolled it into a ball before tossing it into his sealable metal pail. While Po was busy doing that Crane took the time to pull his blue colored pants back on.

He was in the middle of redoing the purple sash around his waist when a question came to mind, one that he immediately asked his friend.

“Hey Po…”

“Yeah Crane”

“Why are you being so cool about my diapers and bedwetting?” Crane asked wanting an answer.
15121.title: Po Doesn't Know How to Knock

151212.content:
Po awkwardly rubbed the back of his head looking embarrassed.

"Uh its better if I just show you" he said as he reached down to grip the side of his patchwork burlap pants.

Crane tilted his head perplexed until the panda pulled them down revealing a sight so stunning that the waterfowl's eyes nearly popped out of his head. For instead of underwear or a naked view of his privates Po was wearing a thick disposable diaper as crinkly and white as his own.

"You wear diapers too!?" Crane exclaimed while trying to keep his voice down so as not to wake the others.

Po blushed as he nodded his head.

"How? What? Why?" he stuttered as he tried to wrap his head around the fact that one of his friends was standing in front of him padded and that that friend also happened to be the legendary Dragon Warrior.

The panda then explained that he...
151212.title: Diapered Dragon Warrior

1512122.content: Was he never potty trained or does he secretly like them?
1512122.title: A different reason

choices: Artifacts he took from the palace vault
An assortment of baby toys for them to play with
15121222.content:
"The truth is I like wearing diapers okay? And I love how they make me feel like a baby whenever I used them" Po admitted with a blush.

"Hold on, you use them too!?" Crane exclaimed, "Like on purpose?"

Po breathed a heavy sigh, "Yes I use them. You don't understand just how good or freeing it feels to just let go into your pants whenever the urge hits you. Honestly if I didn't have to keep my diapers a secret I would have stopped using the toilet years ago and just used them instead. Oh there were so many times I wanted to poop myself like while we were eating dinner, in the middle of training, or even during a mission while fighting bad guys" he lamented sadly.

Crane was slightly taken back by the panda's latest admission, Po having painted a disgusting yet also very intriguing picture.

"Wow, that's uh..." he began.

"Too much information?" Po finished for him.

"Yeah."

"Heh sorry, its just nice to be able to tell someone my biggest secret and not have them think I'm some kind of freak" the panda replied before frowning slightly, "You don't think I'm a freak do you?" he asked wanting to be sure.

"No I don't Po because you're my friend, and also because...well I've been having similar feelings about my own padding as well" Crane admitted with a blush.

"Really? That's so cool, I guess that makes us diaper buddies now" Po said with a smile.

"I guess it does" Crane replied smiling back at his padded friend.

Hearing the sounds of the other masters stirring in their rooms, the two sharing a quick look. "Hey let's both meet back here in my room after lunch alright?" Po said as he hastily put his pants back on to cover up his diaper. "Sounds like a plan" Crane agreed looking forward to hanging out with the panda.

Po grinned before quickly running back to his room while the waterfowl quickly pulled down his own pants with the intent of removing the diaper and saving if for tonight. However before he so much as touched one of the tapes he changed his mind and decided to for the first time ever wear one underneath his clothes for the entire day. Pulling his pants back up just as the morning gong sounded and exited his room to greet Master Shifu with Po and the rest of the Five.

The morning went by pretty smoothly for Crane, they ate breakfast then had their usual pre-noon training followed by light chores then ate lunch at twelve o' clock. He did noticed that Po ate an awful lot more food then usual come lunchtime but figure he was just really hungry today. He was also happy that he had chosen to wear a diaper, the constant presence of his padded garment while not visible left the waterfowl feeling exhalirated as he walked about. Crane could see Po wore his all the time despite the risk it posed.

Speaking of Po it wasn't until an hour after lunch that the waterfowl saw his panda friend again, and when he did he was carrying a wooden crate in his hands. When Crane tried to ask about it Po merely said it was a secret as he carried it back to his room with him following behind.

Once they were inside and the door was shut he placed the box down on the floor.

"Okay Po, what's in the box?" Crane asked.

Po smirked before popping open the lid revealing...
15121222.title: Pampered Po

151212221.content:
Inside the crate was a pair of ornate and decorative urns, one blue and other red and a wooden box nestled amongst a bed of hay.

"Ta-da!" Po gestured with his hands.

"Po, are these what I think they are" Crane question hesitantly staring down at the objects with a worried look.

"Yep, they're some artifacts that I erm "borrowed" from the palace's vault temporarily so to speak" Po admitted not looking the least bit guilty.

"Po you know we're forbidden from taking or using artifacts from the vault without Shifu's express permission" he chastised his fellow warrior.

"I know, I know but Shifu had me cleaning down there today and I decided to take a little detour to the restricted section and you wouldn't believe what I found" Po said with excitement while Crane was still angry about the rule breaking.

"You took artifacts from the restricted section, Po are you crazy? Those ones are the most dangerous" Crane squawk loudly flapping his wings for emphasis.

"Hey now don't wet your diaper on me Crane, I didn't take anything that could potentially destroy the world. I just took ones that would allow us to enjoy our diapers to the fullest" Po replied attempting to calm down the fuming avian.

Crane however still gave the panda a glare for the teasing remark about his padding.

"I'll have you know my diaper is still dry thank you very much."

"Yeah, yeah anyway check out what I got" Po exclaimed before lifting out the two urns and setting them down on the floor, "Behold I give you the Urns of Prematurity and Maturity."

"So what does the Urn of Prematurity do, will it make me as immature as you?" he sarcastically joked in retaliation for the earlier comment.

"What? NO!" Po glared at the snickering waterfowl for the cheap shot before continuing, "These urns contain a mystical powder that when applied can physically make a person younger or older with the Urn of Prematurity, the blue one, making one younger and the Urn of Maturity, the red one, making one older. The only way to reverse the aging caused by one of the urns is with the other urn or at least that's what the inventory scroll said anyway, so I brought both of them with me" he said finishing his explanation.

"Plus the outside of the urns have warning pictures in case people can't read" Crane pointed out turning the urns to showing a diagram of an old person getting younger for the prematurity one and vice versa for the maturity one.

"Huh? I didn't notice those" Po remarked.

"Then its a good thing you choose to read the scrolls" Crane said before turning his attention to the small wooden box.

"And what's in that?" he asked pointed to the aforementioned box.

"Oh that" Po picked it up and opened it to reveal a large golden medallion with stylized carvings and four pointed diamond like ruby in the center. "This is the legendary hypnotizing medallion of Jin Jiao. Whomsoever looks at it as its swinging will become highly suggestible and do whatever the holder commands. It can be used to alter the behavior and memory of people to such a degree that they will think they've always been that way. I've actually got big plans for this bad boy right here" Po said as he coveted the artifact in his hands for a moment longer before setting down on top of the crate.

"Alright, now that explanations are out of the way we can now have some fun you and I" the panda said rubbing his palms together.

"And I think we'll start with the..."
151212221.title: The Urns and the Medallion

1512122212.content:
Po swiped the medallion from its box quicker than Crane could blink.

"Po I really don't think its such a good idea to hypnotize our friends. What if something goes wrong?" he said worriedly.

Realizing his feathered friend wasn't going to drop the issue anytime soon the panda sighed as he regretfully held up the medallion within view of the waterfowl and quickly started swinging it, being careful not to look at it himself.

It happened so fast that Crane wasn't able to shield his eyes in time and was instantly entranced by the swinging coin.

"Relax Crane, nothing bad is going to happen and this is a good idea" Po said letting the medallion do its thing before pocketing it after a few moments.

Hopefully that was the only time he'd have to use it on his friend.

Meanwhile the waterfowl shook his head a little as if dazed than readdressed his friend, "Yeah you know now that I think about it this will be good for the both of us" Crane replied now much calmer and surer.

"Good to hear buddy" Po said giving the bird a pat on the back.

"So what exactly is your plan regarding our friends anyway?"

Suddenly there came a knock on the door followed by Tigress's voice, "Po, Crane, Master Shifu wants us all to meet him in the courtyard for sparring" she announced before promptly leaving.

"Oh you'll see right now. C'mon let's go" Po grinned as he raced Crane to the meeting spot, the latter easily winning to use of flight.

Upon arriving the duo saw Shifu along with the four remaining members of the Five lined up and waiting for instruction. Po was happy to see this as it made what he was about to do next that much easier.

"Ah Dragon Warrior, Master Crane so glad you could join us" the red panda nodded in approval of the pair's prompt arrival.

"Thank you master. Now if you and everyone else would be so kind as to look at this for me that would be great" he said pulling the medallion from his pocket and swinging it in front of him, Crane automatically shielding his gaze from the trinket.

Shifu recognized the artifact too late and wasn't able to cover his eyes in time immediately falling under its sway. Tigress, Monkey, Viper and Mantis not knowing the danger made no such attempt and were entranced seconds before their master succumbed to the medallion.

"Now that I have everyone's attention, listen carefully. Me and Crane wear and use diapers and have always worn and used diapers for as long as you have known us. You're also such good and understanding of our padded nature that you help change us when we need and even go as far as to baby us. In fact you allow and sometimes encourage babyish antics from us as if we were two overgrown toddlers" Po proclaimed being sure to choose his words carefully.

"Lastly all of you will forget anything you know about this medallion or any recollection after seeing it" the panda added at the end making sure to cover his tracks. As he pocketed the medallion the group of masters looked bewildered for a moment before Shifu quickly readdressed everyone.

"As I was saying today we will be sparing in our usual groups. Po, Crane before we begin do either of you need changing?" the red panda asked, the question eliciting a blush from the waterfowl while Po beamed.

"Nah Master Shifu, we're all good" he said before playfully elbowing the bird in the shoulder and whispering, "Sweet it worked!"

"Just let us know if either of you has an accident and we'll take care of it like always" Shifu smirked with a knowing smile.

Without further delay the six masters got into position with their usual partners: Po with Tigress, Crane with Monkey and finally Viper with Mantis.

However before the fighting began the panda contemplated testing the waters further by ditching his pants and going about in just his diaper, to see if he got any reactions as well as flaunt his padding.

1541.title: muscle growth

1542.content:
In a ruin that appeared to be that of an old house lay Tai Lung, his body covered in with numerous bandages, brooding about his humiliating defeat. How could he, Tai Lung, the most feared warrior in China, be defeated by a big, fat, clumsy panda? He was somewhat glad that everyone thought he was dead, or else the scandal would have been more painful then his wounds.

He took a sip of his herbal tea that was boiling on the crude fire, and almost gaged on the taste, but he managed to swallow it down.

He lied back, still thinking of a way to reclaim, but still have vengeance, his honor. An strange idea then came to him; Po, the clumsy panda, was only able to defeat him because of his fat. If he had not have had that, he would have been able to paralyze him a long time ago. And another thing cam into realisation; the panda's weight had a effect has well.

The plan he had was so silly that it made laugh, but he was thinking of fattening himself up to match the so-called Dragon Warrior. And the more stranger thing was that he had quite a few ways how to do it.

The first plan was to recruit himself into a sumo wrestling club, where he not only could get big and fat but maintain his strength and fitness.

The second plan was to go to a goat-shaman that lived somewhere up high in the moantians that where fabled for her witchcraft. She would surely have a spell or two to fatten himself up.

The third and final plan was to steel a herbal-scroll that was hidden somewhere in a library. According to some healers, it had a recipe that could increase the amount of calories in any food source by tenfold.

So, which one shall it be?

However in addition to working on the weapon you also spent quite a couple of years working on another side project, one that no one else not even Zhong knew about it except you. That’s how tightly under wraps this thing was kept especially considering he was attempting to create an elixir capable of changing a person’s...
15431.title: Lord Shen

154311.content:
Shen was in his room standing in front of his worktable which was filled with flasks and retorts bubbling with various colored liquids. Turning off the heat the peacock began to mixed portions of the compounds together as he toiled to make a potion that could restore someone’s physical youth so that when he finally conquered China he could rule over it for all eternity. While the thought of being emperor forever pleased him greatly what Shen really wanted was to be young again. He was already in his late forties and while he didn't feel that old per say he certainly looked it as every time he looked in a mirror he noticed the winkles in his eyes and the raggedness of his feathers.

After mixing the pinkish colored liquid in a beaker for five full minutes Shen decided it was time to test it. Walking over to a small potted plant he kept on his desk the peacock poured a few splashes of liquid onto the blooming flower. After a few seconds he watched in amazement as the plant started to shrink down turning back into a little sapling until it eventually disappeared completely beneath the topsoil. Digging around the dirt with his fingers Shen was happy when he pulled out a small seed from underneath the soil.

It worked…

His youth potion actually worked!

Shen grinned triumphantly as he looked down at his newest creation with glee. Deciding not to waste any time he brought the beaker to his mouth and swallowed a large gulpful of the rejuvenating liquid. Licking his beak the peacock set the beaker back on the table and quickly walked over to his full-size dressing mirror to see his concoction work its magic. Looking at his reflection Shen watched with satisfaction as he grew younger in appearance until he looked like did when he was thirty. The lord smirked as his biological clock ticked backwards, his robes starting to feel loose as he returned to his mid-twenties.

Meanwhile in another part of the factory Zhong better known as Boss Wolf was helping move some crates filled with supplies when a bell alarm suddenly rang. Realizing Shen was calling him and that it was urgent the wolf literally dropped what he was doing and bounded off on all fours in the direction of his master’s quarters.

Upon reaching his destination he threw open the door and rushed inside.

“Lord Shen I came as soon as I could. What’s seems to be the prob-?"

The rest of the sentence died on his tongue as the wolf found himself staring at a…
154311.title: Regressive Alchemy

1543111.content:
The wolf looked down to see a baby peachick with white feathers and red eye markings standing in the middle of a pile of adult-sized robes.

"S-Sir? Is that…you?" Zhong asked, his jaw hanging open slightly and his eyes wide with shock.

"Of course it’s me you fool" Shen shouted in his new high-pitched voice.

"Uh...you're a baby" he said stating the obvious causing the peachick to glare at him.

"I know that I'm a baby you idiot" Shen yelled angrily.

"How did this even happen?" the wolf asked seeming confused.

"I was testing out a youth potion on myself and it worked a little too well. I need your help in reaching my work table so I can make an antidote since I can't in this stupid baby body of mine" he replied then added, "Oh and if word gets out about this I will personally hunt you down and kill you."

"Understood sir" Zhong said as he picked up the young lord and carried him over to the bed where he sat him down, "But first we should probably get you some clothes seeing as your naked right now."

"Alright fine, see if you can find me something suitable to wear" he said with a dejected sigh.

The wolf nodded before rummaging through the linen closet and after a couple minutes of searching came back carrying a folded white object in his paws. Shen's eyes widen as he recognized exactly what it was the wolf was carrying.

"No..." he breathed out, his gaze hardening, “Absolutely not.”

"I’m sorry Shen but for the time being you’re going to have to-"

"I DON'T CARE WHAT YOU SAY I’M NOT WEARING A GODDAMN DIAPER!!" Shen screeched loudly before attempting to run away.

Zhong managed to quickly grab the baby peachick before he could jump off the bed and held him down as he attempted to put the diaper on him. Shen however started kicking his legs and screaming curses and obscenities at the wolf, doing everything in his power to avoid being put in the infantile garment. Despite the temper tantrum he eventually succeeded in putting the diaper on him and taping up the sides.

He then picked the newly diapered young lord up and held him at arm’s length in front of his face as Shen glared daggers at him.

"I...hate...you" he hissed lowly.

Zhong started to say something to try and make his master feel better when the anger in peachick's eyes suddenly vanished replaced with a faraway look.

"Lord Shen?"

He didn't respond, his red eyes narrowing in concentration.

"Hnm…hnn…hnnngh" Shen started to grunt, "Hnn-HrggHHNNGRRGG!"

A few seconds later the peachick visibly relaxed as he let out a muffled fart and a certain smell began to fill the air.

Shen upon realizing what he had just done in his diaper immediately felt...
1543111.title: Shen Now Needs Diapers

choices: The change goes off without a hitch
He ends up peeing halfway through
15431111.content:
Instead of being mortified or angry at messing his pants in front of his second in command Shen was pleased with what just happened to him. He was actually glad that he pooped his diaper as that is what he hoped would occur though the peachick hadn’t expected to go number two quite so soon after regressing, but it was a welcome surprise. The only downside was that Zhong saw him go and while he only felt a small amount of embarrassment at going to the bathroom in front of the wolf it meant that he would be changed right away. Other than that, everything was proceeding smoothly because what the wolf didn’t know was that the whole regression back into a three year old toddler was no accident on his part, Shen had intentional took too much youth potion fully intending to go all the way back to babyhood.

For the truth of the matter was that during his long thirty year exile the peacock lord had developed a certain fetish and become what was uncommonly known as an adult baby diaper lover, or in his case an adult hatchling.

It started several years ago when he and his army were traveling the country and camping out near town and cities. During their frequent incognito trips into the villages Shen often found himself observing the townspeople’s children, more specific the younger ones who weren’t potty trained and still wore diapers. Seeing how happy they were and how much love they got from their parents filled him with a surprisingly strong jealous envy, the peacock lord biting his beak to keep his emotions in check. Later when he was alone and could think properly he would contemplate certain questions like what would it be like to be that young again? And what would it be like to just play freely like that without any worries or responsibilities. But most of all one strange question kept coming back to the forefront of his mind.

What would it be like to wear and use a diaper again?

Shen struggled with these internal infantile musings for many months before finally accepting they wouldn’t go away. Instead he somewhat embraced them by very secretly procuring some babyish items such as toys, bottles and diaper (ones that fit an adult of his size) and exploring this developing fetish of his. While dressing himself in the crinkly padding, drinking from a bottle and playing with the childish objects brought him a tiny bit of piece of peace it still didn’t fulfill his youthful cravings. The peacock lord didn’t want to pretend to be a baby, he wanted to BE a baby again. He wanted to be young for real, young enough that such activities were entirely appropriate for someone his age and that he was also completely dependent on diapers again.

Oh how Shen so desperately wanted that last part.

And so that explained his sudden interest in alchemy as he for many years toiled in secret to make an anti-aging compound, working off of previous attempts by others who failed in their quest for eternal youth. However his genius intellect was far superior to theirs and he had succeeded in creating a potion that reversed the aging process. Though when history recorded his great achievement, he’d make sure no one knew the real reason he created it was so that he could go back and relive his diaper days.

Speaking of diapers Shen was currently enjoying his full one while doing his best to keep his face from betraying his true emotions since the wolf was watching him. His stoic expression nearly faltered when he had finished doing his business in his padding, almost allowing a smile to crack his beak only to at the last feign a grimace. Right now the peachick was replaying his earlier accident over in his head in order to really capture the details as his pooping had been so quick. He remembered the sudden tightness in his bowels, the somewhat loud grunts he let out, all culminating in him uncontrollably pushing a large poo into the seat of his awaiting diaper with an audible fart. The lack of control on his part was to be expected as he knew from his parents that because of his premature birth his muscles weren’t fully developed and didn’t until he was four. Which made the pooping out of the turd all the more satisfying for the young peachick, and from what he could tell it was a pretty big log he let out judging by the bulge he could definitely feel back there. Shen had practiced messing as an adult before so it didn’t feel gross or disgusting to feel his own feces pressed against his bottom. Sitting in his poop was actually triggering some uncomfortability in the form of his new body’s infantile instincts which were subtlety telling him to whine and complain about his messy padding, but he ignored it. However, there was one urge he wished he could give into at that moment and that was the urge to start sucking his thumb.

His thoughts were then interrupted as a strong pungent odor began to rise up from himself and he scrunched his beak at the smell that signaled he needed to be changed.

Just thinking that thought made him want to smile.

Meanwhile the same scent wafted up to the wolf’s nose and thanks to his sense of smell being a hundred times greater it was even worse for him. Zhong scrunched his face wishing he could plug his nose but was unable to as both his hands were full holding up Shen.

“Um sir, it smells like you now need changing” Zhong awkwardly admitted to his small master.

“What was your first clue?” Shen replied with an eye roll before adding, “Well, what are you waiting for? Go on and change me already.”

“You want me to do it?”

The peachick gave a deadpan stare, “Yes, you were the one put me in the thing so you’re going to be the one to take it off me. And for the record you’ll be my changer until I’m an adult again as you’re the only one I trust with doing this task” he admitted. Hearing his newest job description Zhong started to argue back, “But sir I-“

“No buts” Shen quickly cut him off as he lost his patience with the wolf, “I’m ordering you to change my diaper.”

Realizing there was no way around the command as he had sworn his undying loyalty to the banished prince Zhong complied, “Yes master.”

“And don’t rush it either. I don’t want to end up getting a rash because of your carelessness” Shen added as an afterthought as he wanted to savor the coming experience for all its worth.

“Yes master.”

The wolf then carefully laid the peachick down on the bed while he returned to the supply closet to fetch the other necessary items. As for Shen he calmly laid back with his arms folded behind his back, a smirk on his beak as he waited for his second in command to return and give him his first diaper change in over forty-five years.
15431111.title: All According To Plan

choices: Admire his new baby self in the mirror
Retrieve his secret stash of baby items
154311111.content:
Zhong returned from the linen closet a minute later with the necessary changing supplies, namely wipes, powder, and a new diaper to put on him. Shen quickly wiped the grin of his face as soon as the wolf came in, pretending to be unhappy once again. Scowling silently he watched as Zhong placed the items beside him on the bed. He was relieved that his second in command didn't think to asked him why there just happened to be a stash of baby diaper in his closet, but not surprising given his shock at the current situation and the fact the wolf didn't pay attention to the small details. Should the other ask he had a story prepared about a mix up in restocking or if that didn't sound plausible enough that he secretly brought them in case something like this happened with the youth potion. Quieting his inner thoughts Shen eagerly awaited the changing of his messy garment into a nice clean one at the hands of the one eyed wolf.

Meanwhile Zhong was currently standing at the foot of the bed and staring down at the baby peachick that was the infamous Lord Shen who was clad in nothing but a diaper, a diaper whose seat was sporting a tell tale bulge and emitting (to him) a strong and foul odor. After silently strengthening his resolve for the coming task the wolf finally spoke, "So I just gotta take the old diaper off, uh clean you up, add some powder and put the new one on right?" He questioned like a simpleton. Shen had to resist the urge to roll his eyes at the other's explanation, "Yes that is how one typically changes a diaper" he commented dryly then in case there was anymore hesitation added "Now quit stalling and get on with it!"

Picking up on his master's disgruntled tone Zhong reluctantly set to work. His heartbeat quickening in his chest Shen watched with rapt attention as the wolf ripped the tapes on either side free and carefully lowered the front, the subsequent opening of his diaper nailing the canine with a fresh wave of the horrid smell. Zhong immediately took a step back as he gagged a little while Shen watched with amusement, actually finding it a bit funny that his second in command was reacting in such a way to his soiled padding. Had he not needed to keep up appearances he would have giggled or laughed at the other's plight but instead he coldly ordered. "Quit your whining and change me already!" He the visibly kicked his tiny legs to emphasize his obvious frustration with the delay.

Regaining his composure Zhong returned to the task at hand and with a look of disgust clearly evident on his face removed and dragged the dirty diaper off to the side to be thrown away later, doing his best not to look at the mess inside with his one eye. Shen had no such reservations and tilted his head slightly to the side to catch a glimpse of his number two. Seeing a large brown mountain of poo rising up from the seat of the open padding made him smile, feeling proud at his stinky "accomplishment". Returning his attention to Zhong Shen's smile grew even wider as next came the part he was most looking forward to.

The part where Zhong had to wipe his butt.

Still keeping a straight face Shen calmly stared at the wolf as he began to reach downward with a handful of wipes while at the same time lifting his legs up and back. However it took all of the regressed lord's willpower not to moan in pleasure the moment the wipes made contact with his rear end. The next three to four minutes turned out to be a blissful heaven for the peachick as the most clothed were dragged up and down his bottom. Shen didn't feel the least bit ashamed of being taken care of in this way as long ago to justify his baby fetish he surmised that given his lineage he deserved such care. So what if he chose to do his business in a diaper and have it change rather than use a toilet like a commoner then that was his royal right. Same for when he wanted to drink out of a bottle, play with toys or nap in a crib; all of which he deserved to be able to do free of societal judgment. And really all of that was fair game not that he was an actual baby again. His train of thought was interrupted when Zhong voiced an inner thought of his aloud.

"Ugh, I can't believe I'm actually changing your diaper right now" the wolf absentmindedly said only to realized with horror that his careless statement might offend the young master. To his relief Shen simply replied in a huff, "Trust me I never imagined this would happen either" A bold faced lie on his part as he did and that the whole experience thus far had been a dream come true on his part.

Sadly the wiping eventually came to an end as the wolf tossed the dirtied wipes into his old diaper before moving onto the next part. As Zhong was grabbing the bottle of baby powder Shen decided to offer some friendly advice in the form of an order. "Put the new diaper under me before adding the powder. And make sure to sprinkle some inside the seat" he commanded detailing a tip he learned in his research. "Oh right...Yes sir" Zhong complied before slipping a fresh padded garment under the peachick's rear. As the powder was being applied to his diaper area and padding Shen savored the sweet smell of the dust which had become as enjoyable to him as the most fragrant perfume or cologne. Once cloaked in the scent of babyhood Zhong wasted no time in finishing the change by taping the new diaper snugly about his master's waist.

Upon being successfully diapered Shen sat up on the bed and inspected the garment. Deeming it satisfactory he turned his attention to one last piece of unfinished business. "And now would you please get rid of that" he said with a snappish tone pointing at his used diaper still lying on the bed, covering his beak at the offending smell. "Oh right...sorry sir" The quickly balled up the garment and tossed it in the nearby waste bin.

"Is there anything else you need me to do my lord?" Zhong asked.

"Actually there is..."

For the next fifteen minutes Shen had his second in command construct little staircases out of crates throughout his room so he could reach his worktable and bed without assistance. Climbing to the top of his worktable the peachick mixed chemicals in silence appearing to working on the antidote for a couple of minutes before letting the wolf leave with the promise to call for him if he required food or another diaper change, Zhong groaning at the last part.

Once the other had left Shen immediately stopped what he was doing as that was just for show. He had already had the antidote made within the first minute of working and was just waiting to get rid of Zhong. And now that he was gone he could enjoy some private baby time.

With a slight spring in his step the three year old peachick descended the steps and walked to the middle of the room, wondering what to do next.
154311111.title: Changing the Master's Diaper

1543111111.content:
Noticing the full-length mirror he kept in the corner for checking his appearance Shen suddenly became eager to see what he looked like now that he was a baby.

However, as he made his way over to it he passed by the trashcan and looking inside glimpsed his old balled up diaper that Zhong had thrown away half an hour earlier. Stopping in his tracks the peachick turned to face the waste bin his attention focused on the treasure inside, forgetting all about the mirror for the moment. Reaching inside the can Shen grabbed and pulled out the tightly bound padding, the garment still radiating a tiny bit of warmth from its contents.

The toddler stared down at the dirty diaper in his hands with a happy look recalling how he had abruptly pooped in it, knowing he had used it instead of the toilet. Then he remembered having it stripped from his body and seeing Zhong wrap it up then dispose of it causally in the trash, the future fate of all his diapers. Weighing the full padding he was pleasantly surprised to feel what felt like at least a pound of poo contained inside, marveling at the heftiness of his first bowel moment as a baby. Suddenly he wished he had the urge to mess again but unfortunately he didn’t need to go potty right now.

Before he returned the soiled garment back where it belonged Shen lifted the bundle up to his face and pressed his beak against the outside taking a deep whiff. A strong horrible odor flooded the inside of his nostrils his expression screwing up at the overpowering scent of feces for a split second before a wide smile graced his beak. Having been invigorated by the smell of his own poop and slightly high on the noxious fumes he dropped the messy diaper back in the trashcan before toddling off in a blissful haze while listening to the crinkling of the clean one around his bottom.

After taking several steps Shen turned his head and saw that he had wandered in front of the mirror, his original destination. Breathlessly he stared at his reflection immediately taking in all that he saw. And what he saw was a peachick no older than three with red eyes and white feathers. He had a small beak, short eyebrows, a teeny tiny crest of feathers on his head and a stumpy bushel of feathers that one day would grow into a large magnificent train. The baby bird was devoid of clothing save for a plain white disposable diaper taped snugly about his waist, the mere presence of which signified not only his youngness but that he also still went potty in his pants. Shen’s heart beat faster as he focused intently on the image of the babyish garment to the exclusion of all else. His favorite thing about being an abdl had always been the diapers and he showed his love by wearing and using them. But now that he was an actual physical baby in them and seeing his reflection he just suddenly felt…fulfilled.

Letting out a childish giggle-like laugh Shen stuck his thumb and sucked on it as he continued to admire his baby self, the simple action making him look cuter and more adorable. Reaching down with his free hand he rubbed the front of his padding as he began to go through a series of poses that accentuated his crinkly garment. He first did one where he pretended he had to pee badly and squeezed his legs together while holding both hands against his padded crotch as he was desperately trying to hold it in. He held that one for a few minutes before sitting down on his padded bottom with his legs splayed out. Next he got down on all fours and crawled around in a circle in front of the mirror, glancing back every five seconds to see his white rear end with a grin. After a minute of crawling the peachick abruptly stopped then shakily stood up on two legs, acting just like a baby learning how to walk for the first time. He also made a point to stick his diapered butt out as much as possible as he was getting up just to highlight to himself that he was wearing a diaper.

Another happy laugh bursting from his beak the toddler chick began to gleefully toddled about, twisting and turning as he not so subtlety paraded about in his pampers.

However it wasn’t long before Shen realized that all that exercise had made him…
1543111111.title: An Image of Youth

choices: He felt the need to pee
15431111112.content:
The happy three year old abruptly stopped his diapered playtime when his stomach let out a pained gurgle, signaling its apparent need for food.

Shen held his slightly chubby belly with both wings in response as he remembered that he had decided to work throughout lunch and into the afternoon in an effort to finish the youth potion sooner. That coupled with the physical regression back to toddler status and the energy he just expended playing it’s no wonder he was now getting hungry. Checking the time he saw that it was still another two hours until he usually had dinner but that didn't mean he couldn't have a snack to tied him over until then.

And he knew just the perfect thing to sate his hunger.

Grinning to himself the peachick walked over to the side of his bed and from underneath pulled out a small sealed metal box, the outside of which was cold to the touch. Undoing the clasp and opening the lid of the ice box revealed five baby bottles nestled in a pile of snow freshly gathered from the mountainside earlier this morning. Shen had them custom made to be slightly bigger than the average bottle so as to be able to enjoy more milk per feeding even as an adult. And just before he started today's alchemy experiments, he had pre-filled three of the five bottles with fresh milk on the off chance he had a successful test.

Staring down at the infantile containers full of liquid as white as his own feathers Shen felt his breathing quicken and he licked his beak in anticipation. With a shaky wing he reached down and retrieved one of the chilled bottles before sealing the ice box and shoving it back underneath the bed. His prize in hand the peachick eagerly toddled over to the nearby staircase and climbed up onto the bed. Walking across the covers to the other side Shen unceremoniously flopped down on his back against one of the numerous pillows. Holding the bottle with both hands he stared at it for a split second before jamming the rubber nipple into his beak and started sucking. As the cold milk flowed down his throat and filled his belly Shen felt himself enter a state of contentness, his eyes becoming half lidded as he nursed his baba. He always made sure to drink from the bottle very slowly so he could savor the wonderful calming experience for as long as possible. As he drank he lifted his legs up into the air idlily stretching and waving them around, the motions causing his body to slide down the pillow until just his head was resting against it and he was lying completely on his back in the diaper changing position. Speaking of his padding his subtle movements were causing it to let out some light crinkling to remind him of its presence during his feeding.

The bottle now completely tipped upside down Shen continued to gleefully guzzled down the liquid inside, happy as his tummy grew fuller and fuller with every suck on the nipple he took. He was three-fourths of the way done when he felt himself approaching fullness. As an adult he could easily drink two or three bottles but as a baby he seemed to be struggling to finish one. Not one to give up the peachick steeled himself and pressed on even as his stomach began to protest. After four more suckles he managed to drain the last few mouthfuls of milk from the bottle and was left sucking on nothing but air. Shen then cast aside the empty container as his full stomach began to ache, holding his swollen belly with both wings as he let out a quiet whine as his kicked his legs in obvious discomfort. He knew he had pressure inside that needed releasing but unfortunately for him he couldn't burp himself. And so Shen was left in quite a predicament as he rocked back and forth for the next couple of minutes trying to think of a solution. Just when he was about to give up and swallow his pride to call Zhong to ‘assist’ him the toddler lord froze as he felt the pressure suddenly move from his stomach and up his throat. Seconds later a loud burp erupted from his beak, the sound seeming to echo loudly through the room.

Shen simply stared silently for a few seconds after the gassy release before a string of giggles came out of his mouth, it amusing him that such a noise came out of him. Glad that the situation resolved itself and happy to have his hunger taken care of he decided to proceed with his personal baby time. Since he had already finished all of his work for the day he could mess around all he wanted, and what he wanted to do right now was play with some of his toys.

Leaving his empty bottle to be picked up later Shen crawled to the side of the bed and after carefully lowering his body over the edge dropped down to the floor. Reaching under the bed he pulled out a medium sized burlap sack which the peachick proceeded to empty out over the carpeted floor scattering its contents of a dozen toys in different directions. The toys in question were your typical fair for toddlers, building blocks and stacking rings and the like. One object however managed to stand out in the form of a rattle that Shen had procured at the last minute and that he embarrassingly played with rarely from time to time. Walking over and sitting down in the center of the mess of toys he smiled at feel of his pamper cushioning his fall before pulling the colorful rings over and started stacking them. Figuring he’d spend the rest of the time between now and dinner with his toys Shen allowed himself to play like the baby he was.

An hour later he was still enjoying himself the peachick having moved onto building a tower out of his blocks with Shen putting the last one on top when suddenly…
15431111112.title: It's Time For His Baba

154311111121.content:
The door swung open silently as his second in command walked in.

“My lord I came to see if you made any prog-“

The rest of the one-eyed wolf’s sentence died on his lips as he took in the sight before, having walked in in time to see the baby peachick that was his master knocked down a stacked tower of wooden blocks with an excited giggle. It was at that point that Shen heard the wolf’s words and realized with horror that he was no longer alone. Turning around he looked up at the imposing figure of Zhong feeling incredibly mortified at having been caught in the act.

“Master what is this?...” Zhong questioned still dumbfounded and trying to come to grips with the fact he had just saw his boss playing like a toddler.

Shen remained silent, unable to speak in the face of this revelation to one of his most trusted men.

Seeing he wasn’t going to get an answer out of the young lord the wolf allowed his eyes to wander about the room. He had already taken notice of the numerous children’s toys littered around the peachick but the empty baby bottle he spied on top of the bed was new. Suddenly Zhong recalled earlier when he first discovered the regressed lord and how lucky he’d been to find a supply of baby diapers to put him in, now realizing how strange it was for the master to already have such an item on hand right when he needed it.

When he needed it…

His mind quickly began to piece everything together, the realization almost too impossible and incredible to believe.

And yet it made perfect sense given the evidence.

“Sir…you didn’t accidentally take too much of that potion, did you?” he said aloud, feeling a bit uncomfortable with his insinuation, “You wanted to become this age.”

Shen flinched when he heard the other say this, averting his gaze and staring down at the floor in an effort to avoid the truth. However his reaction and continued silence was all the answer the wolf needed.

Nevertheless Zhong continued and asked one more question, perhaps the most important one of all.

“Shen…do you…like being a baby?”

Shen felt like he had been stuck with a hammer at having been asked the one question he hoped he’d never have to answer. His whole body began to shake as the stunned shock wore off and whole mess of conflicting emotions rose up inside the three year old, the main two being embarrassment and anger.
154311111121.title: Caught!

1543111111211.content:
Unable to contain his inner frustration any longer Shen let it all out.

“You stupid idiot, how many times have I told you to knock before entering my personal chambers” he shrieked loudly, the intense of which shocking Zhong into temporarily forgetting about his previous discovery.

“I’m sorry sir, I-I forgot-“

“That’s no excuse for barging in here!” Shen yelled.

Now on the defensive Zhong replied, “I’m very sorry sir, I didn’t mean to upset yo-“

The enraged peachick cut off the other once again.

“And now look what you’ve done…what you’ve seen…YOU WEREN’T SUPPOSE TO SEE ME LIKE THAT!!!” Shen screamed at the top of his tiny lungs causing the wolf’s ears to lay back.

It was the complete truth as Shen would have rather died than have someone find out about his baby fetish.

“My lord it’s okay, everything’s going to be alright” Zhong said calmly as he attempted to soothe the young master’s temper.

“No, its not alright. Everything is completely ruined now that you know…RUINED…RUINED…RUINED!” Shen shouted punctuating every “ruined” by jumping up and down, unaware he was acting every bit the picture of an upset toddler.

Breathing a bit hard from his angry rant and the stomping Shen looked up at the wolf with a hateful. He then moved to step forward planning on pointing an accusing finger at his second in command when he accidentally stepped on one of the blocks which caused him to stumbled forward and fall flat on his face. Pushing himself up a little the peachick felt his entire body start to tremble as his eyes began to water up. As it turned out his outpouring of rage and anger was holding back the sadness welling up inside and all it took was one more humiliation in the form of a single trip to set it all free. Letting out a high-pitched cry Shen started crying uncontrollably, pounding the floor with his tiny wings as he vented his anger in the form of a very loud temper tantrum. After a minute the peachick ended up rolling onto his back and began kicking his feet as he continued to cry and throw a fit.

Meanwhile Zhong stood by too stunned by the regressed lord’s babyish outburst to move or speak. However he was broken out of his stupor by what happened next, namely when Shen pissed himself. At first the wolf thought the hissing his was hearing was coming from one of the factory’s furnaces until he saw the yellow stain appear on the front of the master’s diaper. His eyes widened as the yellow spot rapidly grew bigger and the padding sagged between the chick’s legs. However Shen was too busy crying his eyes out to either notice or enjoy the fact that he was wetting his pamper, the end result of him drinking that bottle of milk half an hour earlier. It was at this point that Zhong knew had to intervene regardless of how uncomfortable the whole situation made him feel. Stepping closer he reached down and grabbed the squirming fussing toddler by his sides lifting him up. Shen of course protested such an action by trying to scratch the wolf with his claws and bite at him with beak in his blind fury. Despite these attacks Zhong brought the crying peachick close to his chest and gently started to pat the young lord’s back having seen mothers calm their babies in such a manner and figuring it would work with Shen. “There, there Shen…there’s no need to cry. I got you” he said awkwardly trying to calm down the chick in his arms. Shen struggled in his grip but he held fast and after several seconds the struggles creased. Slowly but surely his cries began to lessen until they stopped completely as Zhong continued to pat the peachick’s back, Shen resting his head on his shoulder. “Shhh…yes that’s it” Zhong replied as he continued to hold his baby boss in his arms.

He waited a few minutes before slowly moving Shen into a cradling position so he could look him in the eyes. Right away the wolf noticed that the other’s face was still slightly red from his tantrum and his cheeks wet with residual tears.

But aside from all that he seemed to be calm and collected.

“Um master, do you feel better now?” Zhong asked hesitantly.

Shen gave a subtle nod of head, not trusting himself to speak as he was appalled at having broken down in front of his second in command like that.

What then followed was an uncomfortable silence between the two until Shen uttered a single word.

“Yes.”

“Excuse me?”

Shen frowned deeply and turned his head to the side so he didn’t have to look at the wolf, “The answer to your previous question…is yes, I like being a baby.”

“Why would you want to be a baby?” he questioned confused.

“So I could wear diapers again” Shen snapped vehemently, “I spent countless months learning alchemy in order to create a youth potion so I could go back to an age where I needed them because I love them!”

“Hold on, you did all of this so you could go back to diapers and you also love them?” Zhong replied not believing what he was hearing coming out of Shen’s mouth.

“YES!” Shen answered, “I love wearing them and using them and even being changed so there!” he spat out in rapid fashion.

Even though he was eager to get the truth out in the open the peachick managed to restrain from mentioning how happy he had been when he had pooped his diaper hours ago for the first time as an actual baby, and how it was one of the best moments of his life.

Zhong was speechless for some time as his brain attempted to catch up with this startling information. When it finally did the wolf ended up letting out a snickering chuckle that lasted for all of about three seconds as he quickly clamped his mouth shut in response, ears lowered as he worriedly looked down at the small lord in his arms.

He then quickly tried to explain, “Sir I didn’t mean to laugh…it just came out“

“So you think this is funny do you” Shen replied clearly unhappy with his second in command’s reaction to his divulging of his deepest darkest secret.

“Well we’ll see if you’re still laughing after I make you my…”
1543111111211.title: Acting His Age

15431111112111.content:
“You want me to be your caretaker?” Zhong repeated.

“Yes. Since you now regretfully know about my secret I may as well make full use of it” Shen contemplated aloud, “As of this very moment you will also serve as my personal caretaker for whenever I decide to become a toddler. That means bathing me, feeding and playing with me should I request it, and of course changing my diapers when I use them” he said causing the Zhong to grimace at the mention of diaper changes, the memory of the last one still fresh in the wolf’s mind.

Truthfully Shen had already been leaning toward making his commander his caretaker, the earlier summoning of the wolf having been to slowly get him used to his baby self under the guise of an accident. He then hoped to bring up the topic at a later time but fate it seems clearly had other plans and forced the peachick to move up his timetable.

“But sir couldn’t you get someone else to do it?”

“No, you are the only and best candidate for this position” Shen retorted.

“What about hiring someone from the closest village to look after you instead?” he proposed desperate for an alternative.

Shen huffed indigantly, “And trust my secret and well-being to some complete stranger who could easily kill me in my regressed state, I think not.”

“But master I-“

The peachick fixed him with the sternest glare a three-year-old could muster, “No more buts, I am ordering you to do this and that is final” he stated firmly as if daring the wolf to speak back to him yet again.

Remembering he had sworn his undying loyalty to the bird Zhong merely sighed and accepted his fate with a bow of his head.

“Yes my lord.”

“Good. And maybe now you’ll better than to enter my room with knocking.”

As Shen shifted a bit in the wolf’s arms the sound of light squishing drew his attention downward to the yellowed front of his pamper. Feeling the warm wet diaper between his legs he quickly realized that he must have peed it in during his tantrum completely unaware. This made him frown slightly as he had missed the chance to experience the wetting firsthand. However the pee soaked padding still felt really nice what with it warming his crotch and sagging due to being heavy with his urine. Even the smell faint as it was was improving his mood as the peachick lounged in his damp garment. Looking up at Zhong who was quietly standing and holding him Shen decided to have some fun and make use of his new caretaker.

“I’m wet and I need to be changed” he spoke up in a loud and clear voice.

“Um come again sir”

“I said I need a new diaper” Shen spelled out for the spaced out wolf.

“Of…of course master, I’ll take care of that right away” Zhong hastily replied.

The wolf then carried him to the bed and left him there as he retrieved the supplies from the linen closet. When he returned he saw the peachick lying calmly on his back with his wings folded across his chest. Unlike earlier this time Shen was smiling openly now being able to show his true emotions. Watching with delight as the two tapes holding the garment together were deftly ripped free Shen sighed happily, glad to once again be going through the process known as a diaper change. However he quickly breathed back in as the front came down and the cool air hit his damp privates. Ignoring the small chill he then did his usual thing of looking on as Zhong placed the soiled diaper off to the side. While he was glad to see the garment puffy, swollen and yellow he wished he could have added a brown solid or two to the seat. But he reminded himself that the day wasn’t over yet and that there was still time for him to go number two again, hopefully before bed.

Shen suddenly became excited as he felt his legs being lifted up and back knowing that he was about to be cleaned. He curled his talons as the first wipe made contact biting back a moan as Zhong liberally went over his crotch. Unable to contain his pleasure Shen hummed lightly as he was wiped down by the wolf. Meanwhile Zhong was taking the change in stride despite the sheer awkwardness of cleaning his boss’s privates and knowing from his expressions that he was enjoying every second of it. It weirded him out that Shen could be so into diapers and being treated like a baby but he was honor bound to indulge his master’s whims. On the bright side the wolf was glad he was dealing with a wet diaper this time around and not a messy one as it made the process a lot more bearable. After cleaning the last of the pee from between the chick’s legs he moved to quickly wipe his bottom the action causing the other to hum in approval. Shen enjoyed the attention his rear received right up until the point it stopped and he felt it being lifted and lowered onto a soft crinkly new set of padding. He was wearing a sleeveless black gi top, black fingerless gloves on his hands, a black belt around his waist, and black bottoms with black sandals. He was tall, had short shimmering blonde hair, sparkling blue eyes, and a great physique. The young man finally spoke. "Greetings, my name is Roku" he said as he clasped his hands together and bowed to everyone. "It's a pleasure to meet such great Kung Fu masters". Everyone continued to stare at him. "Uuuuhhhh" Roku said awkwardly rubbing the back of his head. "You'll have to forgive my students" Shifu spoke up. "For some of them this is their first time seeing an actual human". "Oh sorry" Roku replied. "I forgot you guys aren't used to seeing humans in this neck of the woods. "My apologies" Shifu said returning Roku's bow. "Oh" Tigress finally snapped out of it and nudged the others to do the same. Everyone bowed back to Roku. "Thank you" he said. "Yes, there hasn't been a human in the Valley of peace in centuries. "Really? Why is that"? Roku asked. "Well, the predators sort of took a liking to them". Shifu replied. Roku looks up to see Tigress turn away rubbing her neck nervously. "Oh" Roku said surprised. "You need not worry about things like that now. The inhabitants of this region have become much more civilized since then. "Well, that's a load off" replied Roku with a sigh of relief. "So what is it you are doing here"? Inquired Tigress. "I've been told that fate has chosen the new Dragon Warrior". Roku replied. "That's me" said Po walking up to you. "Nice to meet you. The names Po, Roku right"? He asked "Yes, nice to meet you too Po". "So what can the bodaciously awesome Dragon Warrior do for ya"? He asked striking a few fighting poses. "Fight Me"! Roku exclaimed. "Yeah cuz I-come again". Po stuttered. "Fight me Dragon Warrior, I've traveled from afar to test my skills against the mightiest of warriors". Roku replied taking a fighting stance. The cloaked man takes out a dagger and sticks it through the note. Taking careful aim he throws it to where it will pass rightby the panda's head but with cut some of his fur. The cloak man jumps away to avoid being found and disappears into the plantlife making his escape.
15521211.title: He ascends the steps

155212111.content:
Po and the Furious Five were finishing up their training for the day, which was Po's favorite time of

day because it meant it was almost time for dinner. “Excellent job today everyone. Especially you Po,

your skills are improving drastically everyday” said Master Shifu. “Heh, well you know how it is,

being the Dragon Warrior and everything” Po replied arrogantly. The Five just sighed and rolled their

eyes. “Yeah” Po continued. “I doubt anyone could take me on with my bodaciously awesome kung fu

skills”. “You know Po” Shifu retorted. “No matter how strong or skilled an individual may be, there is

always someone out there who is stronger still”. “Thanks for the the advice teach, but I'm the Dragon

Warrior. If there was someone out there stronger than me, and I seriously doubt it, I think I would

know. Trust me, nothing gets past me-WHOA”! Po screamed as he was interrupted by a shimmering

object that flew just past his head. They look down at the ground to see it was a dagger. Everyone was

quickly on guard, searching for whomever may have thrown it. However, there was no one around.

“Look, there's a note” said Tigress, handing the paper to Shifu. “Hmm” he said as he scrolled through

it. My my, it's addressed to you Po” he said. “Lemme guess, more fan mail” he said. “Not quite” Shifu

replied. “It says, 'Dragon Warrior, for you to hold that title is an insult to me and my kind. I hereby

challenge you to battle. Meet me in the open fields on the outskirts of the Valley of Peace one week

from now at sundown. Should you lose, you shall strip yourself of the title of Dragon Warrior. Don't

make me come looking for you'. “Uuuuhuh” said Po. “Well, too bad for this guy, I don't think I'm

gonna be able to make it”. “Oh, and why is that”? Asked Shifu. “Well you know, cuz I gotta be at that

place....with the thing.....and the people.....” he replied as he began to slowly walk away, only to turn

around to see Tigress in the way. “Weren't you just going on about how strong you are” she said. “Yeah,

surely some random challenger isn't too much for you” said Viper sarcastically. “Uh, heh heh, no way,

of course not. I'll be there, and I'm gonna win” he said clenching his fist. He then walked inside for

dinner and everyone but Shifu and Tigress followed. “Master” said Tigress. “Do you really think he'll

be alright”? “Don't worry yourself Tigress. If anything, this will be a good lesson in humility for him,

and if things get out of hand, we'll be there to help”.
155212111.title: The Challenge

Normally dinner would be happy and cheerful in the jade palace. But There was an aura of Dread and fear coming from Po which was effecting everyone. This continued until Shifu clear his throat. "Po if it makes you feel better we'll lookfor who your challenger is and I will diuble your training." Shifu says before sipping his tea. "Really oh that would be awesome." Po says and the atomosphere doing a 180 much to everyones relief. "So we will start first thing in the morning. Tigress, Viper, Crane, Mantis, Monkey search the valley for anyone new." Like I know why but can't remember the exact reason. Oh but thats enough of that for tonight. Good night Tigress." Shifu says walking towards his bed chambers. Tigress stares at the challenge for a few moments before also heading to bed.
