"There now i'm less conspiculess. After hiding his cloak he moves to the valley of peace. After a while he encounters
1552121111.title: At Dinner

15521211111.content:
Once he shape shifted into a snake, the mysterious man realized he had yet to eat breakfast. So he

slithered along the streets of the Valley of Peace searching for a suitable place to eat. As he turned the

corner leading down another busy street, someone caught his eye. His eyes were fixated on the person,

he couldn't look away. “Wow” is all he uttered as he continued to gaze at them. He immediately

recognized her as Viper of the Furious Five. 'Sigh, she's even more beautiful in person' he thought.

Viper continued to slither down the street in his direction. She looked as if she was trying to find

someone. As he was daydreaming he suddenly snapped back to reality, remembering that he was trying

to be inconspicuous. He casually slithered up the street as if nothing was wrong. 'It could just be

coincidence' he thought. 'But perhaps they were sent out to find me'. He managed to make his way past

Viper without her noticing him, or so he thought. 'Good, looks like I managed to slip through that one.

Now I just need to find a place to lay low until it's time for the-' “Excuse me” said Viper, interrupting

his train of thought. 'Damn' he thought as Viper made her way over to him. “Hi” she said cheerfully.

“Um, hello” he said with a slight hint of nervousness in his voice. “I'm Viper, what's your name”? She

asked curiously. “R-Raikoho” he replied. “Nice to meet you” she said. She saw that he was a bit

nervous. “Are you okay”? She inquired. “Yes, I'm fine. It's just, getting to meet one of the Furious Five

is an honor and a privilege” he retorted, trying to remain undiscovered. “Your not from around here are

you”? She asks. “Nope, just a mere traveler passing through” he replies nonchalantly. 'Hm, this guy

doesn't seem like the type that would issue the kind of challenge we saw yesterday, but he is an

unfamiliar face, I'd better not rule anything out' Viper thought. “So where are you headed”? She asked.

“That's kind of personal” he replied, trying to keep his answers as vague as possible. “Oh, sorry” she

said in return. “It's no problem, don't worry about it” Raikoho replied. At that moment his stomach

began to churn and growl. 'Perfect' he thought. “Well it was a pleasure to meet you” Raikoho said

bowing to Viper. “I'm off to get some breakfast” he said, trying to slither away before she could ask

him anything else that could jeopardize his plan. “Mind if I come with you” she asks. 'I have to find out

more about this guy to rule out the possibility that he's the one who sent that letter' Viper thought.

'Damn, what am I going to do'? Raikoho asked himself in thought. 'If I agree and let her tag along,

there's a chance she could discover my intentions. But if I say no, she might think something's up'.

What does he decide?
15521211111.title: The First Encounter

choices: One of the furious five came in.
155212111111.content:
'It better to have her with me that way I looks like I have nothing to hide. Cause if I was to decline she would get suspicious of me not to mention she's very beautiful.' Raikoho thought. "Sure I wouldn't mind its always good to be in the company of ones own species especially if they're so beautiful." Raikoho said and a few seconds later his eyes widened. 'Open mouth insert foot.' Raikoho thought while doing a snake version of a face palm and Viper blushing a bit. "W Well shal we go?" Viper ask tring to conceal her blush. "Ah sure." Raikoho says with a nervious laugh. 'And hopfully we will both pretend to that my little slip will never be mentioned by either of us.' Raikoho thought.

Both Raikoho and Viper slithered off to find a good resturant. They eventually came to Mr. Ping's Noodle Shop. Both Viper and Raikoho sat at a table waiting for the food they ordered. "So Raikoho tell me about yourself." Viper says. "When where would you like me to begin?" Raikoho asks rubbing his chin with the end of his tail. "Well how about where you are from." Viper says. "Ah ok I came from a village that is high up in the mountains. Where it is mostly like winter." Raikoho tells. "Godness it must be terrible seeing how our kind are cold blooded." Viper says. "Normally, yes but we adapted and it's not as much of an issue but it also change our color as you can see." Raikoho says gesturing to himself. 'Well it's not really a lie. Seeing as that is how the snakes of my village are.' Raikoho thinks. "Oh it must be hard to live up there even if you have adapted." Viper says. "I won't deny that it's a hard life but it is a gradifing life seeing as you must work hard to survive." Raikoho says sipping his tea. Before Viper could reply
155212111111.title: Breakfast

1552121111112.content:
Raikoho and Viper continue eating their meal, making light conversation when Crane swoops down

and lands right by Viper. He looked to be out of breath and looked distressed. “Crane”? She asked.

“What's the matter”? He looked at Raikoho and motioned for Viper to come closer so he could whisper.

He covered their mouths on the off chance Raikoho could read lips (or beaks). “We need to postpone

our search, something urgent has come up and we're needed back at the palace” he said. “What's going

on”? She asked. “I'm not aware of all the details but Shifu told me it was urgent and to gather

everyone” replied Crane. “You head back while I inform everyone else, I'll be there shortly”. He said as

he quickly flew off to find everyone else. “Well, looks like I'm going to have to cut breakfast short” she

said to Raikoho with a smile. “Oh, why's that”? He asked. “You need not concern yourself, Furious

Five business” she replied. “Oh alright then, take care. It was a pleasure meeting a lady as beautiful as

yourself”. He said. This caused Viper to blush slightly. “And it was a pleasure meeting a man as

handsome as you” she retorted, which in turn, caused Raikoho to slightly blush as well. “Farewell” she

said as she quickly slithered to roof and began moving and jumping from building to building, making

her way back to the Jade Palace. 'Looks like I'm in the clear for now' thought Raikoho. 'But I wonder

what was so urgent'? He asked himself.
1552121111112.title: Crane's Message

choices: A Week Later (Time for Po's Challenge)
15521211111121.content:
All of the Furious Five had been gathered, as well as Po, and they were all waiting in the great hall.

“What do you suppose this is all about”? Asked Tigress. “Whatever it is, I hope it isn't too serious”

added Monkey. Everyone heard the door creak open and saw Shifu walk in. He took his place at the

head of the table. “Everyone, I have very unnerving news” he said in a grave tone of voice. Everyone

looked on, anxiously awaiting what Shifu had to say. He let out a heavy sigh as he prepared himself for

what needed to be said. “Our sister school to the East.....has been.....completely destroyed” he said in a

somber tone. He was met with gasps from everyone in the room. “B-but, what about Masters Rhino and

Crocodile, and all the students”? Asked Po. Shifu looked up at them, a tear in his eye. There.....were no

survivors....”. The room went silent as no one could comprehend what Shifu just said. Everyone was

tearing up. After another minute or two, Tigress finally spoke up. “How could this happen? Who

could've possibly done this”?! She asked infuriated. “Master's Rhino and Crocodile are among the

greatest Kung Fu masters is all of China”! Said Po. “Yes, whoever did this, they are certainly

terrifyingly powerful.

=========================================================================

(A Week Earlier. Somewhere in Eastern China)

A bright full moonlit night, is tarnished with the blood, anguish, and desperation of a Temple that is

burning to the ground. Blood splattered corpses lay all across the grassy field on which the temple

stands. In the middle of the field, only three men remain standing. Master Rhino, Master Crocodile, and

a mysterious looking man in a black gi. He was tall and had short, shimmering blonde hair. But his

most terrifying feature, were his ominous, red glowing eyes. He just stood there with an evil scowl on

his face. Master's Rhino and Crocodile looked beaten, bloody, and bruised, on the verge of collapse.

Master Rhino spoke up. “Who are you?! Why have you done this?! What justification could there

possibly be”?! The man just stood there for a moment, taking in what Rhino had asked. “Justification?

What justification? I do this for the thrill of the fight! I do this seeking opponents whom can offer me

what I seek” he replies. “W-what is it you seek”? Asked Crocodile. “A FIGHT TO THE DEATH”! He

exclaimed. “To die in battle at the hands of a fellow warrior is the greatest glory any fighter can

achieve”! “The Hadou within me wants NOTHING LESS”! “Y-you're insane”! Said Rhino. “You

simply lack understanding. Don't worry, you will soon be enlightened as I grant you a true warriors

death”! Rhino and Crocodile took defensive stances, their bodies were about ready to give out as they

prepared themselves for the fiends attack. “Shun Goku Satsu”! He yelled. “GWAAAHHH”! The blood

curdling screams of agony from Rhino and Crocodile echoed across the plains. The next thing you

know, the man stood over the now lifeless bodies of Rhino and Crocodile. “Hmph” he scoffed as he

looked up at the moon. “Hopefully the Dragon Warrior is able to grant me what I seek” he said as he

walked off into the distance.
15521211111121.title: A New Foe

The identaty of the one who is behind this is still unknown." Shifu informs. "Master is this to be considered good or bad news?" Tigress asks voicing everyone's concerns. "It is too soon to say because most clans join willingly and there haven't been any real battles as of yet. For now continue as you have, but be on guard I doubt our challenger had anything to do with our sister school's destruction but that doesn't mean that they aren't with those who are building up their forces." Shifu instructs "Now anyone have anything to report on our challenger?" Shifu asks.
155212111111211.title: Back at the Meeting

1552121111112112.content:
Viper looks away, avoiding the question. Crane sees this and speaks up. “I saw an unknown traveler at

the local noodle shop. He's a light blue looking snake. I saw Viper with him”. Everyone looks in Viper's

direction. “Is this true Viper”? Asked Shifu. “Y-yes master” she stammered. “I was gathering intel on

him” she said. “Oh, is that what you call it”? Asked Crane sarcastically, which made Viper blush. “Yes

well, whatever you THINK I was doing I wasn't able to gather much information before YOU called

me back to the palace for this meeting” she said. “In any case, keep a close eye on him. With all that's

going on we can't afford to be too trusting of strangers at this time. All of you just keep an eye out for

suspicious looking activity and stay vigilant. Meeting adjourned”. “Yes master” says everyone in

unison as they bow and exit the great hall. Six days have passed since the meeting with no luck in

finding out who the secret challenger is. It's night before the fight is set to take place. Shifu is taking a

stroll and sees Po sitting under the Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom. He walks over to comfort his

student. Po sees him coming and says “You know, this is where I first met Grand Master Oogway”.

“Ah yes, I remember it well” replied Shifu. “What do you think he would say about what's been going

on”? Asked Po. Shifu looked up at him and said “I think he would say your training has been going

well, but the most important thing you can do now is believe in yourself and trust in your training”. Po

looked back up at the starry sky and smiled. “You're right master, thank you”. “And don't worry Po, no

matter what may transpire tomorrow, we will be there for you should you need us”. They both bowed

to one another and retired for the evening. At the opposite end of the palace, Viper was slithering along

a pathway, but she continued to look back and forth as she went, as if she were expecting someone. She

then heard an almost inaudible hiss from behind some bushes and turned in that direction. “R-Raikoho,

is that you”? She whispered. “Yes” he replied as he slithered out from behind the bushes. “I don't have

much time, it's very risky for us to be meeting like this” said Viper. “I know” Raikoho replied. “But I

couldn't stand being away from you”. He slithered up to her and began nudging his head against hers.

“I just had to tell you” he said. “I have somewhere very important to be tomorrow, so don't expect to

see me in town”. “Really? Where are you going”? She asked. “You need not concern yourself, official

Raikoho business” he replied, quoting her what she had said to him almost a week ago. They then

heard someone coming around the corner. “Gasp! Someone's coming I have to go” said Raikoho.

“Wait” said Viper. “I have to ask. Are you the one that challenged Po to fight tomorrow”? Raikoho

looked back at her sternly but said not a word. He then quickly slithered back through the bushes and

off the palace grounds. It was then that Monkey was approaching Viper. “Hey Viper. What are you

doing all the way over here”? He asked. She looked back towards the bushes where Raikoho had just

been and back to Monkey. “Nothing” she replied as she slithered back to her quarters for the evening.
1552121111112112.title: A Challenge Close at Hand

155212111111211212.content:
Raikoho stood there in cloaked form, just as he was when he first arrived in the valley. Viper let out a sigh of refief, thinking it wasn't her blue snake friend she had been with all week. Po looked nervous, again looking at the stranger cloaked in a black cloak. "Po come with me. Monkey, Tigress bring the table and chairs. Mantis bring the contract, Crane the quills, and Viper bring the ink." Shifu instructed and they made their way to the cloaked man. "You are the one who issued the challenge to Po the Dragon Warrior correct?" Shifu asks. Raikoho only nods. "Very well." Shifu states as the Furious Five set up the table. After setting it up, both Raikoho and Po sat in the chairs. "This contract, as you both know, is a formality and it states that by signing this you both agree that in the case of death the opponent will not be charged with murder. Sign it if you accept." Shifu says placing the contract inbetween both them on the table. Raikoho grabs a quill and signs it *Raging Dragon* while skillfully not revealing his hand. Shifu's eyes widened at the sight of the name but said nothing. Po eventually signed it very reluctantly. After both signatures were on the contract Shifu took it and the Furious Five took the table, chairs, quills, and ink away and moved to a proper distance to watch.

"I've changed my mind, all of you pray. Pray Po lives through this. Cause his opponent is the current undefeated champion of the Imperial Arena in the capital, Raging Dragon." said Shifu, causing all of the Furious Five's eyes to widen as the identity of the challenger began spreading through the villagers crowd. Both Po and Raikoho each bowed and assumed their stances. Raikoho made the first move and rushed forward delivering a swift kick across Po's face sending him skidding a few feet. Raikoho waited patiently for him to get back up. Po took a few seconds to get up back was still a little wobally. "Wow that is some mean kick you got there." Po comments on. "Why thank you. But that was just a love tap compared to what your about to face." Raikoho said. Viper felt as if her heart had stopped. She knew that voice, there was no mistaking it. Viper was about to say something when Raikoho charged again. This time Raikoho was delivered many punishing kicks to Po stomach before kicking him into the air. Raikoho didn't let up, cause he jumped up after him and gave a bone jarring punch to Po's chest sending him hurdling into the ground. Raikoho landed a few yards away with the grace of an experienced acrobat. Po took several minutes to get up, this time wobbling around like he was drunk. "You were right that was like a love tap." Po said sounding like he was out of it. Shifu was about to intervene when
155212111111211212.title: Raikoho in cloaked form

1552121111112112121.content:
It looked as if Raikoho would claim victory as Po continued to wobble to and fro. Shifu was about to

intervene, when suddenly a figure in black burst forth from high atop the treetops and landed with a

loud THOOM! Which echoed throughout the area. This caught everyone's attention as they all turned

their attention to the figure, they saw it was a human. Gasps were heard from the crowd of people as

they recognized what the figure was. “A human”?! Said Mantis. “What in the world is a human doing

here”?! As they looked on they saw that he wore a black martial arts gi, appeared to be in peak physical

condition, and had piercing red eyes. “I don't know” said Shifu. “But from the looks of it this can't be

good”. Raikoho merely continued to look onward with mild interest at this turn of events. Shifu

approached the human and asked “Who are you sir, and why are you here”? The man looked down at

Shifu with a scowl on his face and back to the crowd of people. He then spoke up. “I am Roku of the

Fist. I seek the Dragon Warrior so that I may challenge him. Who among you claims the title of Dragon

Warrior? Speak now! So that we may do battle”! Everyone remained silent. The crowd looked to Po to

see that he was still a bit loopy. In his delusional state, Po pointed at Raikoho earning him a variety of

shocked, surprised, and confused looks from the crowd. Roku saw Po pointing toward Raikoho and

smirked. “Heh, so you're the Dragon Warrior”? Roku asked. Raikoho looked back towards Po, seeing

him pointing at him. Then looked back to Roku. “I suppose I am human. I am a dragon and I am a

warrior” said Raikoho. “I did not realize the title was meant to be taken so literally” said Roku walking

over to Raikoho. As he walked over to him, Shifu saw Japanese writing on the back of Roku's gi. It

read “Heaven”. His eyes went wide in shock. “I-It can't be” he said. “What is it master”? Asked

Tigress. “Please....don't let it be HIM”! He said in a desperate tone. “In any case, you'd do well not to

take me lightly Dragon Warrior” said Roku. “I am no ordinary human. I.....am the Raging Demon”! He

exclaimed. Shifu took a step back in fear. “No.....it can't be...” “Boy”! Shifu shouted, grabbing Roku's

attention. “Tell me. Who is your master”? This made Roku smile. Your suspicions are correct old man,

I am the disciple of......Akuma! Master of the Fist”! Raikoho raised his brow, recognizing the name.

“So, I take it that makes you a demon as well”? Raikoho asked. “Yes” Roku replied. “The Raging

Demon”. This caused Raikoho to smile. “Good, then perhaps I'll have a decent challenge” he said

taking a stance. “Yes, I am hoping you're are able to offer this hadou the challenge we seek” said Roku

as his eyes began to glow a darker red and he began to be enveloped in a red aura. “I just hope you can

offer me a better challenge than those weaklings from the Eastern temple”. This made the Five, Shifu,

and Po gasp in horror. “It was HIM”! Said Tigress, poising to attack. “Wait”! Said Shifu. 'This isn't

good. The Raging Dragon AND The Raging Demon in one location, and on top of that they're about to

do battle'! “We have to evacuate the citizens and get them away from here”! “But what abou-” JUST

DO AS I SAY”! Shifu yelled interrupting Tigress. “This battle is far too advanced for us” he admitted.

“We would be destroyed instantly” he said somberly. “Now quickly evacuate everyone and get as far

away from here as you can he told the Five. “What about you master”? Asked Po. “I must stay to

ensure that they don't destroy the Valley” Shifu replied. “But-” “GO”! Shifu commanded, interrupting

Monkey. Viper looked back at Raikoho with a sad and depressed look on her face as she followed her

comrades in evacuating the people. The area was cleared out in a short amount of time and the only

three people that remained were Roku, Raikoho, and Shifu, who was watching from a safe distance.

Both Roku and Raikoho had taken their stances. Powerful auras were surrounding them as they

prepared to attack. 'The Raging Dragon vs. The Raging Demon' thought Shifu. 'Who will claim

victory'?
1552121111112112121.title: The Raging Demon

15521211111121121211.content:
Roku steps forward, analyzing Raikoho. Then he thrusts a punch at half strength, right to his

gut. Raikoho uses his right arm to knock Roku's punch to the side and palm strikes Roku with

his left hand. Sending Roku staggering back a few steps. Roku then sees his lip is bleeding.

He grows evermore excited at the prospect of this new challenger as he wipes the blood from

his lip. "This is going to be fun" he states. 'Let's see how he handles this' he thought, cupping

his hands together at his side. A dark purple glow envelops his hands. "Hadouken"! he

shouts, sending the ball of energy towards Raikoho. Raikoho brings his arms up into an x

block and lets the attack hit him kicking up a large amount of smoke. Once the smoke clears,

Roku sees that Raikoho is completely unharmed. “Impressive” he says. “But what do you say

you stop playing defense and show me what you got”? He said arrogantly. "I would but that

would imply I think your good enough for me to bring that out. Besides like your one to talk

seeing how your holding back as well." Raikoho says. Meanwhile Shifu is stunned to see a

real live dragon. "Ow my feelings" Roku said sarcastically. "You're more perceptive than I

thought". "If that's the case then how about we do each other a favor and stop pussyfooting

around". His eyes began to radiate with pure blood lust as the dark red aura around him grew

even larger. “Very well." Raikoho says raising his right hand into the air with one finger

extended. "Rai Higyou." Raikoho says, throwing his hand down. With it, a bolt of lighting

comes down targeting Roku. Roku looks up to see the lightning and embraces it with a

sadistic smile, not even trying to dodge it. Then with a loud thundering and crackling BOOM!

it connected and smoke and debris fill the area. Raikoho looks on, waiting to see the damage.

When the dust settles he see's Roku still standing, though his body is smoking and slightly

burnt. "Heh, that was quite the shock treatment" Roku says smiling, seemingly unaffected.

"You actually managed to fix a kink in my neck that I've had for a while. Have you ever

considered work in physical therapy" he asked, mocking Raikoho. "Why no, I never had the

interest but I do like to teach my favorite subject which is." Raikoho said before disappearing

and reappearing in front of Roku. Before Roku could react Raikoho grabbed his hair and

pulled it down while thrusting his knee up into his face. A audible crack was heard. Using the

momentum he still had, Raikoho twisted his body and delivered a kick into a portion of Roku's

torso that looked especially badly burnt sending him flying. "Pain 101." Raikoho finished.

Shifu was just joined by the furious Five and Po after seeing the lighting strike and getting

the villagers to safety. They all look on with awe at the sight before them. "This is unreal"

said Po. "No wonder that guy was kicking my butt. This is way above my pay grade".

Everyone nods in unison and remains speechless as they continue to watch the fight. Roku

falls to the ground with loud THUD! He quickly pops back up, cracking his neck and back

joints. "This is GREAT! I haven't had a challenge like this since I fought my master"! Roku

says, continuing to smile. "Ashura Senkuu" he states. Roku instantly disappears and

reappears in front of Raikoho. "Shoryuken"! He yells connecting with a strong, right handed

uppercut, sending Raikoho up into the air. Before he flies up too far however, Roku grabs the

end of his tail. I'm not done yet"! he says pulling him back down while throwing a left hook

right at Raikoho's face, sending him tumbling backward about 20 feet. Raikoho rises lazily,

almost instantly. "Is that it? Is that your strongest punch? Cause to tell the truth I'm losing

interest in this. I overestimated you cause the truth is I didn't feel that at all." Raikoho said

with a bored look and tone. Raikoho seems to strike a nerve as Roku seems annoyed at his

comment to say the least. Roku's eye's spark red as he cups his hands at his side yet again.

But instead of a purple aura, his hands glow a dark red, like the energy around him.

"Metsu...." He says in a dark tone. "HADOUKEN"! Unleashing a much bigger ball of energy

than before. Raikoho sighs and raises his arm and slightly rotates it. The energy attack hits

his arm dead on but instead of exploding it bounced off and was sent back at Roku who was

shocked at what just happened. The energy attack hit close to Roku but not close enough to

get caught in the explosion. Everyone was surprised and confused at what just happened.

Raikoho starts tapping his forearm with his clawed finger. "Dragon scales are unique you see,

they are naturally light weight and almost nothing can scratch them, let alone damage them.

They also can reflect most energy attacks like a mirror reflects light. You see my kind are

natural born predators not much can hurt us and we also are incredibly physically strong."

Raikoho explained. "And lets not forget what dragons are most famous for." Raikoho says

leaning his head back as he inhales a large amount of air and shoots a large fireball directly

at Roku. Everyone continues to look on in astonishment at this amazing display of power.

Viper seemed the most concerned as she was anxiously fixated on Raikoho, nervous for his

well being and his current predicament. "This is the greatest fight I've ever seen" says

Monkey. "Indeed, they are very powerful" says Tigress. "But don't forget why were here. We

must protect the Valley of Peace at any cost should things get out of hand". "No offense

Tigress but, ARE YOU INSANE"! Says Po. "These guys are brushing off attacks that would

KILL us like they were nothing". "Even so" said Shifu. "It is our sworn duty to do so, no

matter how out matched we may be". Everyone turns their attention back to the fight to see

Raikoho unleash a giant fireball aimed directly at Roku. Roku, no longer smiling or cracking

witty one liners, quickly teleported behind Raikoho, who was still breathing fire. "Tatsumaki

Zankuukyaku"! He delivers a swift, multi striking hurricane kick, followed by a strong

Shoryuken uupercut to the jaw, sending Raikoho soaring into the air. Roku quickly teleported

into the air above Raikoho, slamming both fists directly into Raikoho's forehead. Which sent

him careening and crashing into the ground. "Graaahhhhh"! Roku yells as his hands glow yet

again. He then begins firing an onslaught of energy volleys, pounding down on where

Raikoho had landed. Roku then lands gracefully on the ground and sees nothing but smoke

and ash filling the air around the crater he just created. "Lets see you come back from that

you dragon bastard"! Roku said triumphantly. The smoke clears and Raikoho was standing

there with only a few scratches some of his clothes torn. Raikoho uses his hand to casually

brush off some dust on his arm. "Okay, I'm getting tired of this, so lets see how you handle

this." Raikoho say before disappearing and reappearing in front of Roku thrusting his kick

forward at Roku's left leg. After connecting a sickening sound like that of a twig being

snapped was heard and Roku's leg bent in the wrong direction. Before Roku could even

scream Raikoho's tail encircled Roku's left arm and another sickening sound was heard and

Roku's arm went limp. Using his tail Raikoho threw Roku at a boulder. Raikoho not satisfied

thrust his fist forward and a powerful wind slams into Roku's chest and smashes him through

the boulder. After a moment or two, Roku weakly stood up, staggering on one leg, coughing

up blood. "I gotta hand it to you, you can take a hell of a beating" said Raikoho. "Don't think

you've won yet. I have yet to unleash my ultimate technique" he said smiling, despite the

searing pain flowing through his body. "Come on with it then" said Raikoho, motioning for

Roku to bring it on. "SHUN GOKU SATSU"! Roku shouted and he began to slide forward, on

one leg at a fast pace. Raikoho brings both his hands together in front of him and waits for

Roku to get closer. "Rei Kō Kyō Han Shō" Raikoho says as all of Roku's energy leaves him and

manifests in a light blue energy ball in Raikoho's hands before launching forward in a beam

sending Roku flying towards a far off mountain. "The end." Raikoho says bringing his hands

to his sides.
15521211111121121211.title: Roku vs. Raikoho

155212111111211212111.content:
(This portion of the interactive is told in the perspective of the Five and the audience)

What first started as a day of fun and merriment had turned into disaster as the Dragon Warrior, the

people's hero, had inadvertently relinquished his title as such to a mysterious hooded stranger. Then, to

top it off, the disciple of the most feared martial artist in the world decided to rear his ugly head and

cause wide spread panic and fear. It's at this point that all of the villagers are being quickly evacuated

from the battlefield as Roku of the Fist and the mysterious stranger begin to do battle. The Furious Five

safely escort all the villagers away from the scene. Many people turn back to see nothing but carnage as

the battle rages on. There's nothing but smoldering ash, dust, and debris covering the entire area.

Everyone's ears are met with the sound of thundering and crackling as the two warriors continue to

exchange blows. The scariest part for the villagers was not knowing if they would be safe from either

of the competitors once the fight was over. The Five look on from a distance with the villagers, in awe

of the sheer magnitude of this battle. “This is insane” says Tigress. “We can't just stand here and leave

Shifu alone out there with those monsters”. She began to make her way back towards the battlefield

only to feel a snag on her hand. “You heard what master said” said Po. “We're to stay here and watch

over the people”. “I don't want to hear it from you EX Dragon Warrior” she replied, emphasizing the

EX as she poked him in his furry chest. Po merely turned away, dropping his head in shame. “Don't be

so hard on him” said Monkey. “He was clearly outmatched. None of us could've taken that guy”. Viper

is remaining silent the entire time. Wondering how she could've let herself be deceived so easily. She,

and everyone looked up in awe to see a dark cloud formation forming over the battlefield. Then

suddenly, a large lightning bolt came crackling down with a loud BOOM! Once the Five recovered

from the shockwave of the lightning, they all looked at each other and nodded. “Village elder” said

Tigress, looking at the older looking goat. “Continue to lead the villagers to safety. We will come for

you when the battle is over”. The elder nods and begins to do as she requested. The Five and Po then all

immediately began to make their way towards the sight of the fighting. Once they get there, they are

relieved to see that Shifu is alright and begin to look on towards the fight with amazement.
155212111111211212111.title: The Evacuation

1552121111112112121111.content: Raikoho starts walking up to the group dusting himself off and stops in front of the group and bows. If a challenge is interrupted by a third party with no affiliation to either challenger or challengee the match is declared invalid and the challengee is allowed to keep the title or what they have wagered in the match and the challengee must wait six months before making another challenge. So you shall keep your title for now." Raikoho says to them

Azure was doing his usual favorite pastime, practice a move he learned from a marshal art training video. He wouldn't call himself a fanboy of marshal arts, tho he did enjoy a good fight in both movies and real life. Today he was practicing a French subbot double kick. As he sat down and try to massage his muscles a little so he could try agin he heard a strange sound. Almost like a chuckling from a very old person.
"Hmmm.... he the one, he could make waiting for Po new challenge a more fun show." The old voice said as it seem to float closer to azure. "Sorry young one but this will be a very nauseatingly fall." The voice said before azure could move he was smashed thru the ground as if it was glass.
When he woke up he felt just as bad as if he was beaten all over with a bamboo stick repeatedly. As he sat up he ran his hand thru his messy black hair and look around for his glasses hoping that they wher not broken in what ever that all was.
As he try to set his bones back in to place with a crack or pop he look around. He was on the outskirts of a small village and next to a road sign.
Valley of peace 5 miles away.
Bamboo bridge inn up the road.
Azure cheek if he was clothed. Luck him he was in a dirty dusty robe that was stained drown instead of black, his shirt and pants where simple and comfortable to him, his shoes where wood sandals. He huffed and started walking to the inn.
"Well if I act nice I might get a bed and meal for a needed sleep, nothing else I could at lest find out where I am." Azure said to himself as he walked.
As he did he felt that he was not alone and was being followed as he neared the in. "Fine if that how it going to be," Azure turned to what he guessed was where the watchers where, "come out and face me with some honest guts," he held his hands up ready to fight.

155212221.content:
Winters are harsh: that should come as little surprise to any traveler this time of here. But there was always something magical about winter, or at least for me. Snow crunched under my hooves as I slowly made my way over wooden, arched bridge, steam rising from my nostrils. I was glad that I brought my cloak along, else the cold would be unbearable, but it gave me a some what sinister appearance,unfortunately.

The town was eerily quiet; the town's folk was most likely in their homes, escaping the cold, unforgiving weather. I envied them; here I was, walking in the freezing air like a fool, but my task made me do it. The scent of something sweet but spicy drifted through the air. My belly growled. Hunger wasn't the best thing to feel right now - especially if you had better things to attend and fast - but I was mortal, and mortal beings need to eat.

I followed the smell, leading me to a small noodle shop. A few costumers where seated, eating or just chatting amongst themselves. Casually I took a seat. "What can I get you?" The voice that spoke was so sudden that it nearly made me jump. Looking down, I saw a elderly looking duck staring at me with a friendly smile.

I was a little slow with speaking (I mostly blamed it on the cold), and ordered the usual. The duck left with a brief nod, heading back the the kitchen. My eyes drifted upwards to the large construction sitting on top of the hill - the Jade Palace.

It looked well fortified, but I knew I could complete my task, even if it meant to kill me. But for now, I had to find a place to stay and establish my plan. 'Soon, Po, your life won't be so happy anymore. I know your weakness, and, ironically, it is one of your strengths. The smell of something delicious reached my nostrils ones again. "Ah, my food has arrived," I mumbled to myself.
155212221.title: The antagonist.

15531.content: You are Hypon the wolf. You have been taught by Master Wolf in the Northern Region of China. But One night, he was killed by an unknown assassin who fled to the Valley. Hypon has sworn his revenge to fine his master's killer. Who then run into....?
15531.title: Hypon the Wolf

155311.content: Hypon is a disciple of Kung Fu and is currently seeking revenge for the murder of his master, Master Wolf. In his search he has made his way to the Valley of Peace to seek guidance and training from the greatest hero in all of China, none other than the Dragon Warrior himself. It is about mid day as we find Hypon just now making his way into the Valley. A few of the citizens take notice as he makes his way through the front gates. It would seem hard not to take notice, considering his tall and strong physique, dark black fur, bright ruby red eyes, and white gi with black belt around his waist. He just seemed to have an overall shady looking appearance to him. 'Geez' Hypon thought to himself as he continued to look at the onslaught of stares and whispering going on around him. 'This place is just teeming with hospitality' he thought sarcastically. As he continued walking he felt a pain in his gut telling him it was time to eat. Hypon just so happened to be close by Mr. Ping's (Po's Father's) noodle shop. He decided it was as good a place as any to grab a bite to eat. "Welcome" said Mr. Ping in an enthusiastic voice. "How may I serve you today"? He asked as Hypon took a seat. "Do you serve dumplings"? Asked Hypon. "Why yes we do, and it's your lucky day, dumplings are the value special of the day. How many should I put you down for sir" Mr. Ping asked politely, pen and paper in hand. "Fifty please" said Hypon sincerely. "Alright then fifty dumplings it is- f-f-f-f-f-f-FIFTY"?!?! Exclaimed Mr. Ping. "Yes please" replied Hypon. "Oh you got it" said Mr. Ping catching his breath. "Fifty dumplings for my best customer, coming up"! He shouted. 'Well' thought Hypon, waiting on his order. 'At least the service is nice'. About twenty minutes later Mr. Ping came out with Hypon's order. He was quickly dispatching the dumplings when there was suddenly a large commotion going on just down the street. Hypon peeked his head out to see a few oxes giving a bunny merchant a rough time. Smashing the fruit vendors merchandise and wrecking his cart. Hypon let out a heavy sigh as he new what he needed to do. He walked up to the front of the restaurant, placing some currencey on the desk. "You might want to make the rest of those dumplings to go" said Hypon. "Just wrap 'em up for me. I'll be back in a minute" he said reassuringly. "You got it sir" replied Mr. Ping with a hint of concern for the brash young wolf. As Hypon made his way down the road he could begin to make out the conflict. "P-p-p-please stop" said the rabbit timidly, "I'll pay the protection money as soon as I can, I promise". "That ain't good enough furball" said one of the Ox thugs. "Yeah" said the other. "You might wanna cough up the rest of the dough. It'd be a shame if somethin' happened to this crappy cart of yours" he said shaking it roughly. "Oh no" said the rabbit. "Excuse me gentleman" said Hypon, from behind the Oxen. "You mind stepping aside, I'd like to buy some fruit" he said nonchalantly. "Beat it stranger. We got business with the rabbit" said one of them. "Yeah, get lost" said the other. They then turn their attention back to the rabbit. "Perhaps you gentleman didn't hear me" said Hypon grabbing the two oxen by their horns. He then threw them in the opposite direction of the rabbit and his stand, sending them tumbling and crashing into a wall. "I said....'Excuse me'." He said in a cool tone. "Are you alright"? he asked the rabbit. He was obviously still shaken, but still nodded. "You're gonna regret that stranger" said one of them as they groggily rose to their feet. They both pulled out axes and prepared to attack. Hypon takes a step forward and gives them a very intimidating, low growl. Their eyes go wide and they turn tail and run. "Let's get outta here" shouted one of them as their twin dust trails disappeared from view just as the two oxen themselves did. "That's right, run" said Hypon confidently, "and don't let me catch you harming the innocent again". As he turned and helped up the rabbit merchant he looked up in surprise to see that it wasn't him that scared off the two oxen bullies, but the person standing on top of the archway. He saw that it was none other than Master Tigress of the Furious Five. "Thanks for taking care of that" she said in her usual monotone voice as she hopped down beside you. "You saved me the trouble" she added. "Yeah, well thanks for the help" replied Hypon sarcastically. "Do you honestly think you needed it"? She asked. "True" replied Hypon. "Sir....Sir"! Shouted Mr. Ping as he made his way over to Hypon and Tigress. "I was just on my way over to give you the rest of your order, but those two thugs snatched it from me and ran" he stated. As if on cue, Hypon's stomach growled. "That's just great" Hypon said out loud. "Come with me" said Tigress, motioning for Hypon to follow her. "Why" he asked curiously. "You did my job for me before I could get here, the least I can do is feed you. Now come on" she said rather demandingly. 'Sheesh. Pushy lady' Hypon thought to himself. 'Pretty easy on the eyes though' he thought as he got a good look at Tigress as he began to follow her.
155311.title: Making an Impression

155311122.content:
As if on cue, Master Shifu appeared behind the Furious Five, Po, and Hypon and spoke, "The bunnies are small and considered weak, making them easy targets, but it seems they have an unlikely ally they would not expect to help them." They all turned to face the entrance to see the red panda known as Master Shifu and Hypon stood in silence as he knew who he was in the presence of as Master Shifu was looking at him as he then quickly appeared right at the foot of Hypon.

Po looked at Hypon and wondered, "His stance, his clothing, he must be from a different region. Hypon then spoke directly to Master Shifu with a bow, "Master Shifu, Master Wolf has perished." Shifu's facial expression didn't change as Hypon spoke but a slight gasp could be heard from behind him. Hypon then continued, "I believe that who ever attacked Master Wolf fled the mountains and went into hiding." Tigeress just stood next to Hypon in silence as he explained why he entered the valley...

Shifu then spoke to interrupted Hypon, "If you need somewhere to stay, we can make room, but we will help you find this assassin." Hypon then bowed towards Mastet Shifu, "Thank you, Master Shifu. Wolf spoke of you highly."
155311122.title: Master Shifu enters

choices: Meanwhile with Master Shifu and Po
1553112.content:
Some of the rest of the members were waiting around a table as they were waiting for Tigeress to appear, but only Snake was quiet as Crane and Mantis waited with less patience. "What is taking Tigress so long? I told her she shouldn't of gone alone." Crane said as he tapped his wing against the table. Snake then interjected, "I'm sure it was nothing and she is making her way back up now." Mantis then joined in, "Probably taking the scenic route." Snake then gave Mantis a glare, "Tigress has been worked up for weeks after the events months ago, she needs her space."

With Tigress and Hypon...

Both of them were racing on the rooftops and using the trees to get higher up towards the Jade Palace, not trying to make conversation until they were at least walking distance to the palace. They then jumped onto the stairs halfway up from the bottom and they caught their breath as they continued upward. "So why is a wolf like you doing this far down south?" Tigress asked as they were making it up the stairs. Hypon didn't know if she should tell her, but quickly swayed away the thought as she was a student of Master Shifu, "Well, Its twofold, but I have to relay a message from my master to Master Shifu. That's all I can say about it right now about it." Hypon was hesitant in telling her the other half now, but knew it would be better to save it when he was with Master Shifu's company as they continued making it up the stairs.

1553311.content:
The use of spirit orbs was almost forgotten or banned from past events. However not all heavily expelled this method of teaching, resulting in a new prodigy to be born. Unlike the previous master Ding, this user had no ill intentions or impatience. Xiaoli Mengyao finished his ten year training on the mountains, honing his skills with the monks that remained. The ten years were hard on both the student and the monks; the student was at first difficult to train and the monks feared of their demise much like that of their predecessors. However the young panther showed them not just raw untapped skill and potential, but also a pure heart and innocent soul. This proved to be the essential factors that lead to the success of the master-in-training. Pleased with the results, Xiaoli was set out from the care and training of the monks and sent down for a more practical approach. He would be tested not just on his mental abilities and focus, but now on his fighting capabilities with his newfound power.

Xiaoli was a black panther, a prime example of a panther. Even for his age he was tall, strong, built, and very handsome. His sleek black fur had the right amount of sheen that could be seen in the proper lighting. The yellow eyes of the panther not only showed a fierce and powerful being, but was yet gentle and calming to look into. Xiaoli wore no shirt which left him exposing his muscular build to everyone. He had large pecs, a firm six-pack, and very powerful looking biceps. He wore the bottom portion of a cloak, pants tied with a thick belt that laced around his waist. The only article of clothing that he sported on his upper body was a necklace, made entirely of spirit orbs which were held together merely by Xiaoli's own mental focus. In total, the number of spirit orbs that made up this necklace was thirty. The panther finally arrived at the edge of the Valley of Peace. He took strong strides into the village. The imposing figure of a panther was apparent from the looks of fear across the villager's faces. Xiaoli thought nothing of this, completely understanding. He made his way to the center square before he heard a commotion. He turned and made his way near, seeing several bandits. However they were all being fought off by...
1553311.title: Prodigy of the Spirit Orbs
